Anuruddho vā pabbājeyyāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Gharāvāsattha^eb^nti gharāvāsassa anucchavikaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Udakaṃ abhinetabba^eb^nti udakaṃ āharitabbaṃ. ^b^Ninnetabba^eb^nti ābhatamudakaṃ puna nīharitabbaṃ. ^b^Niddhāpetabba^eb^nti antarantarā uṭṭhitatiṇāni uddharitvā apanetabbaṃ. ^b^Lavāpetabba^eb^nti paripakkakāle lavāpetabbaṃ. ^b^Ubbāhāpetabba^eb^nti khalamaṇḍalaṃ harāpetabbaṃ. ^b^Ujuṃ kārāpetabba^eb^nti puñjaṃ kārāpetabbaṃ. ^b^Palālāni uddharāpetabbā^eb^nīti palālāni apanetabbāni. ^b^Bhusikā uddharāpetabbā^eb^ti gunnaṃ khuraggehi sañchinnā bhusasaṅkhātā nāḷadaṇḍā apanetabbā. ^b^Opunāpetabba^eb^nti vātamukhe opunāpetvā palālaṃ apanetabbaṃ. ^b^Atiharāpetabba^eb^nti antokoṭṭhāgāraṃ upanetabbaṃ. ^b^Na kammā^eb^ti na kammāni. ^b^Gharāvāsatthenā^eb^ti upayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Upajānāhī^eb^ti ca upasaggamatto ^b^upa^eb^-saddo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gharāvāsatthaṃ jānāhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jānāhī^eb^ti cettha paṭipajjāti attho veditabbo. ^b^Akāmakā^eb^ti anicchamānā.

[03]^b^331-332^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yaṃ na nivatto^eb^ti yasmā na nivatto. ^b^Suññāgāragato^eb^ti (udā. aṭṭha. 20) ‘‘ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña’’nti (pārā.92) vuttaṃ araññaṃ rukkhamūlañca ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pabbatakandarādi pabbajitasāruppaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ janasambādhābhāvato idha ‘‘suññāgāra’’nti adhippetaṃ. Atha vā jhānakaṇṭakānaṃ saddānaṃ abhāvato vivittaṃ yaṃ kiñci agārampi ‘‘suññāgāra’’nti veditabbaṃ. Taṃ suññāgāraṃ upagato. ^b^Abhikkhaṇa^eb^nti bahulaṃ. ^b^Udānaṃ udānesī^eb^ti so hi āyasmā araññe divāvihāraṃ upagatopi rattivāsūpagatopi yebhuyyena phalasamāpattisukhena nirodhasamāpattisukhena ca vītināmesi, tasmā ^a^M3.0411^ea^ taṃ sukhaṃ sandhāya pubbe ^a^V3.0375^ea^ attanā anubhūtaṃ sabhayaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ jigucchitvā ‘‘aho sukhaṃ aho sukha’’nti somanassasahitañāṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ pītisamuggāraṃ samuggirati. ^b^Te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocu^eb^nti te sambahulā bhikkhū ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitā tassa anuggaṇhanādhippāyena bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ, na ujjhānavasena. ^b^Nissaṃsaya^eb^nti asandehena, ekantenāti attho. Te kira bhikkhū puthujjanā tassa āyasmato vivekasukhaṃ sandhāya udānaṃ ajānantā evamāhaṃsu. ^b^Samanussaranto^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhanavasena anussaranto.

[03]^b^Aññatara^eb^nti nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ. ^b^Āmantesī^eb^ti āṇāpesi te bhikkhū saññāpetukāmo. ^b^Eva^eb^nti vacanasampaṭiggahe, sādhūti attho. ^b^Evaṃ bhante^eb^ti ettha pana ^b^evaṃ^eb^-saddo paṭiññāyaṃ. ‘‘Abhikkhaṇaṃ ‘aho sukhaṃ aho sukha’nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesī’’ti yathā te bhikkhū vadanti, taṃ evaṃ tathevāti attano udānaṃ paṭijānāti. ^b^‘‘Kiṃ pana tvaṃ bhaddiyā’’^eb^ti kasmā bhagavā pucchati, kiṃ tassa cittaṃ na jānātīti? No na jānāti, teneva pana tamatthaṃ vadāpetvā te bhikkhū saññāpetuṃ pucchati. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchantī’’tiādi (pārā. 16, 194). ^b^Atthavasa^eb^nti kāraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Antopi antepure^eb^ti itthāgārassa sañcaraṇaṭṭhānabhūte rājagehassa abbhantare, yattha rājā nahānabhojanasayanādiṃ kappeti. ^b^Rakkhā susaṃvihitā^eb^ti ārakkhādikatapurisehi gutti suṭṭhu samantato vihitā. ^b^Bahipi antepure^eb^ti aṭṭakaraṇaṭṭhānādike antepurato bahibhūte rājagehe. ^b^Evaṃ rakkhito gopito santo^eb^ti evaṃ rājageharājadhānīrajjadesesu anto bahi ca anekesu ṭhānesu anekasatehi susaṃvihitarakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā mameva nibbhayatthaṃ phāsuvihāratthaṃ rakkhito gopito samāno. ^b^Bhīto^eb^tiādīni padāni aññamaññavevacanāni. Atha vā ^b^bhīto^eb^ti pararājūhi bhāyamāno. ^b^Ubbiggo^eb^ti sakarajjepi pakatikkhobhato uppajjanakabhayubbegena ubbiggo calito. ^b^Ussaṅkī^eb^ti ‘‘raññā nāma sabbakālaṃ avissatthena bhavitabba’’nti vacanato sabbattha avissāsanavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīyānaṃ accayato uppajjanakaparisaṅkāya ca uddhamuddhaṃ saṅkamāno. ^b^Utrāsī^eb^ti ‘‘santikāvacarehipi ajānantasseva me kadāci ^a^M3.0412^ea^ anattho bhaveyyā’’ti uppannena sarīrakampampi uppādanasamatthena tāsena utrāsi. ‘‘Utrasto’’tipi paṭhanti. ^b^Viharāmī^eb^ti evaṃbhūto hutvā viharāmi.

[03]^b^Etarahī^eb^ti idāni pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya. ^b^Eko^eb^ti asahāyo. Tena vivekaṭṭhakāyataṃ dasseti. ^b^Abhīto^eb^tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Bhayādinimittassa pariggahassa ^a^V3.0376^ea^ taṃnimittassa ca kilesagahanassa abhāvenevassa abhītāditāti etena cittavivekaṃ dasseti. ^b^Appossukko^eb^ti sarīraguttiyaṃ nirussukko. ^b^Pannalomo^eb^ti lomahaṃsuppādakassa chambhitattassa abhāvena anuggatalomo. Padadvayenapi serivihāraṃ dasseti. ^b^Paradattavutto^eb^ti parehi dinnena cīvarādinā vattamāno. Etena sabbaso saṅgābhāvadīpanamukhena anavasesabhayahetuvirahaṃ dasseti. ^b^Migabhūtena cetasā^eb^ti vissatthavihāritāya migassa viya jātena cittena. Migo hi amanussapathe araññe vasamāno vissattho tiṭṭhati nisīdati nipajjati yenakāmañca pakkamati appaṭihatacāro, evaṃ ahampi viharāmīti dasseti. Vuttañhetaṃ paccekasambuddhena –
[21]‘‘Migo araññamhi yathā abaddho;
[27]Yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya;
[26]Viññū naro serita pekkhamāno;
[22]Eko care khaggavisāṇakappo’’ti. (su. ni. 39; apa. thera 1.1.95);

[03]^b^Imaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, atthavasa^eb^nti bhagavā yadidaṃ mama etarahi paramaṃ vivekasukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ, idameva kāraṇaṃ sampassamāno ‘‘aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha’’nti udānemi. ^b^Etamattha^eb^nti etaṃ bhaddiyattherassa puthujjanavisayātītaṃ vivekasukhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. ^b^Imaṃ udāna^eb^nti imaṃ sahetukabhayasokavigamānubhāvadīpakaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03]^b^Yassantarato na santi kopā^eb^ti yassa ariyapuggalassa antarato abbhantare attano citte cittakālussiyakaraṇato cittappakopā ^a^M3.0413^ea^ rāgādayo āghātavatthuādikāraṇabhedato anekabhedā dosakopā eva vā na santi, maggena pahīnattā na vijjanti. Ayañhi ^b^antara^eb^-saddo kiñcāpi ‘‘mañca tvañca kimantara’’ntiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.228) kāraṇe dissati, ‘‘antaraṭṭhake himapātasamaye’’tiādīsu (mahāva. 346) vemajjhe, ‘‘antarā ca jetavanaṃ antarā ca sāvatthi’’ntiādīsu (udā. 13, 44) vivare, ‘‘bhayamantarato jāta’’ntiādīsu (itivu. 88; mahāni. 5) citte, idhāpi citte eva daṭṭhabbo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘yassa citte kopā na santī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Abhava^eb^-saddassa ^b^vibhava^eb^-saddena atthuddhāre kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘vibhavoti ca abhavoti ca atthato eka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Iti^eb^-saddo pakāravacanoti āha ^b^‘‘iti anekappakārā bhavābhavatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vītivatto^eb^ti atikkanto ^a^V3.0377^ea^. Ettha ca ‘‘yassā’’ti idaṃ yo vītivattoti vibhattivipariṇāmavasena yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Taṃ vigatabhaya^eb^nti taṃ evarūpaṃ yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgataṃ khīṇāsavaṃ cittakopābhāvato itibhavābhavasamatikkamanato ca bhayahetuvigamena vigatabhayaṃ. Vivekasukhena aggaphalasukhena ca ^b^sukhiṃ,^eb^ vigatabhayattā eva ^b^asokaṃ. Devā nānubhavanti dassanāyā^eb^ti adhigatamagge ṭhapetvā sabbepi upapattidevā vāyamantāpi cittacāradassanavasena dassanāya daṭṭhuṃ nānubhavanti na abhisambhuṇanti na sakkonti, pageva manussā. Sekkhāpi hi puthujjanā viya arahato cittappavattiṃ na jānanti. ^b^Tassa dassanaṃ devānampi dullabha^eb^nti etthāpi cittacāradassanavasena tassa dassanaṃ devānampi dullabhaṃ alabbhanīyaṃ, devehipi taṃ dassanaṃ na sakkā pāpuṇitunti evamattho gahetabbo. Abhāvattho hettha ^b^du^eb^-saddo ‘‘duppañño’’tiādīsu viya.

[03]^b^333^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhattābhihāro^eb^ti abhiharitabbabhattaṃ. Tassa pana pamāṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pañca ca thālipākasatānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tattha eko thālipāko dasannaṃ purisānaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhāti. ^b^Lābhasakkārasilokenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^lābho^eb^ nāma catupaccayalābho. ^b^Sakkāro^eb^ti tesaṃyeva sukatānaṃ susaṅkhatānaṃ lābho. ^b^Siloko^eb^ti vaṇṇaghoso. ^b^Manomayaṃ kāya^eb^nti jhānamanena nibbattaṃ brahmakāyaṃ. ^b^Upapanno^eb^ti upagato. ^b^Attabhāvappaṭilābho^eb^ti sarīrapaṭilābho. ^b^Dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakhettānī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0414^ea^ ettha ^b^māgadhakaṃ gāmakhettaṃ^eb^ atthi khuddakaṃ, atthi majjhimaṃ, atthi mahantaṃ. ^b^Khuddakaṃ gāmakhettaṃ^eb^ ito cattālīsa usabhāni, etto cattālīsa usabhānīti gāvutaṃ hoti. ^b^Majjhimaṃ^eb^ ito gāvutaṃ, etto gāvutanti aḍḍhayojanaṃ hoti. ^b^Mahantaṃ^eb^ ito diyaḍḍhagāvutaṃ, etto diyaḍḍhagāvutanti tigāvutaṃ hoti. Tesu khuddakena gāmakhettena tīṇi, khuddakena ca majjhimena ca dve gāmakhettāni tassa attabhāvo. Tigāvutañhissa sarīraṃ. ^b^Pariharissāmī^eb^ti paṭijaggissāmi gopayissāmi. ^b^Rakkhasseta^eb^nti rakkhassu etaṃ.

[03]^b^334^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Satthāro^eb^ti gaṇasatthāro. ^b^Nāssassā^eb^ti na etassa bhaveyya. ^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ satthāraṃ. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti amanāpena. ^b^Samudācareyyāmā^eb^ti katheyyāma. ^b^Sammannatī^eb^ti amhākaṃ sammānaṃ karoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sammānetī’’^eb^ti, ^b^sammannatī^eb^ti vā parehi sammānīyatīti attho.

[03]^b^335^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyyu^eb^nti acchapittaṃ vā macchapittaṃ vā nāsāpuṭe pakkhipeyyuṃ. ^b^Parābhavāyā^eb^ti avaḍḍhiyā vināsāya. ^b^Assatarī^eb^ti vaḷavāya kucchismiṃ gadrabhassajātā, taṃ assena ^a^V3.0378^ea^ saddhiṃ sampayojenti, sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ na sakkoti, pādehi bhūmiṃ paharantī tiṭṭhati, athassā cattāro pāde catūsu khāṇukesu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti, sā tattheva marati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘attavadhāya gabbhaṃ gaṇhātī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^339^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Potthanika^eb^nti churikaṃ, yaṃ kharantipi vuccati.

[03]^b^342^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mā kuñjara nāgamāsado^eb^ti bho, kuñjara, buddhanāgaṃ vadhakacittena mā upagaccha. ^b^Dukkha^eb^nti dukkhakāraṇattā dukkhaṃ. Kathaṃ taṃ dukkhanti āha ^b^‘‘na hi nāgahatassā’’^eb^tiādi. Nāgahatassa sugatipaṭikkhepena buddhanāgassa ghāto duggatidukkhakāraṇanti dasseti. ^b^Ito^eb^ti ito jātito. ^b^Yato^eb^ti yasmā. ^b^Ito paraṃ yato^eb^ti ito paraṃ gacchantassāti vā ^a^M3.0415^ea^ attho. ^b^Mado^eb^ti mānamado. ^b^Pamādo^eb^ti pamattabhāvo. ^b^Paṭikuṭito^eb^ti saṅkuṭito. ^b^Alakkhiko^eb^ti ahiriko. ^b^Yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yo nāma.

[03]^b^343^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tikabhojana^eb^nti tīhi bhuñjitabbabhojanaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ ekato paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ paññapessāmīti attho. ^b^Kokāliko^eb^tiādīni catunnaṃ devadattapakkhiyānaṃ gaṇapāmokkhānaṃ nāmāni. ^b^Āyukappa^eb^nti ekaṃ mahākappaṃ asītibhāgaṃ katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ antarakappasaññitaṃ kālaṃ.

[03]^b^Āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavocā^eb^ti (udā. aṭṭha. 48) devadatto sabbaṃ saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāgaṃ nipphādetvā ‘‘ekaṃseneva ajja āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammañca karissāmī’’ti cintetvā etaṃ ^b^‘‘ajjatagge’’^eb^tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Tattha ^b^aññatreva bhagavatā^eb^ti vinā eva bhagavantaṃ, taṃ satthāraṃ akatvāti attho. ^b^Aññatra bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cā^eb^ti bhagavato ovādakārakaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vinā maṃ anuvattantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āveṇikaṃ uposathaṃ saṅghakammāni ca karissāmi. ^b^Ajjatagge, bhante, devadatto saṅghaṃ bhindissatī^eb^ti bhedakārakānaṃ sabbesaṃ devadattena sajjitattā ‘‘ekaṃseneva devadatto ajja saṅghaṃ bhindissatī’’ti maññamāno evamāha. ^b^Bhindissatī^eb^ti dvidhā karissati.

[03]^b^Etamatthaṃ^eb^^a^V3.0379^ea^^b^viditvā^eb^ti etaṃ avīcimahānirayuppattisaṃvattaniyaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ devadattena nibbattiyamānaṃ saṅghabhedakammaṃ sabbākārato viditvā. ^b^Imaṃ udāna^eb^nti kusalākusalesu yathākkamaṃ sappurisāsappurisānaṃ sukarā paṭipatti, na pana nesaṃ akusalakusalesūti idamatthavibhāvanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03]Tattha ^b^sukaraṃ sādhunā sādhū^eb^ti attano paresañca hitaṃ sādhetīti ^b^sādhu,^eb^ sammāpaṭipanno. Tena sādhunā sāriputtādinā sāvakena paccekasambuddhena sammāsambuddhena aññena vā lokiyasādhunā sādhu sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ attano paresañca hitasukhāvahaṃ sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkā. ^b^Sādhu pāpena dukkara^eb^nti tadeva pana vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sādhu pāpena devadattādinā ^a^M3.0416^ea^ pāpapuggalena dukkaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, na so taṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti attho. ^b^Pāpaṃ pāpena sukara^eb^nti pāpaṃ asundaraṃ attano paresañca anatthāvahaṃ pāpena yathāvuttapāpapuggalena sukaraṃ sukhena kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. ^b^Pāpamariyehi dukkara^eb^nti ariyehi pana buddhādīhi taṃ pāpaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ. Setughātoyeva hi tesaṃ tatthāti dīpeti.

[03]^b^345^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā^eb^tiādīsu parassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathanaṃ ^b^ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ,^eb^ sāvakānañca buddhānañca satataṃ dhammadesanaṃ ^b^anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ,^eb^ iddhividhaṃ ^b^iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ^eb^. Tattha iddhipāṭihāriyena saddhiṃ anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ mahāmoggallānattherassa āciṇṇaṃ, ādesanāpāṭihāriyena saddhiṃ anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ dhammasenāpatissa. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘āyasmā sāriputto ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya ovadī’’tiādi. Tadā hi dvīsu aggasāvakesu dhammasenāpati tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittacāraṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desesi, mahāmoggallānatthero vikubbanaṃ dassetvā dhammaṃ desesi, pāḷiyañcettha dvinnampi therānaṃ desanāya dhammacakkhupaṭilābhova dassito. Dīghabhāṇakā pana evaṃ vadanti ‘‘bhagavatā pesitesu dvīsu aggasāvakesu dhammasenāpati tesaṃ cittacāraṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desesi, therassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcasatāpi bhikkhū sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ mahāmoggallānatthero vikubbanaṃ dassetvā dhammaṃ desesi, taṃ sutvā sabbe arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsū’’ti. ^b^Devadattaṃ uṭṭhāpesī^eb^ti jaṇṇukena hadayamajjhe paharitvā uṭṭhāpesi.

[03]^b^346^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sarasī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0380^ea^ saro. ^b^Suvikkhālita^eb^nti suṭṭhu vikkhālitaṃ, suvisodhitaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Saṃkhāditvā^eb^ti suṭṭhu khāditvā. ^b^Mahiṃ vikubbato^eb^ti mahiṃ dantehi vilikhantassa. Nadīsu bhisaṃ ghasānassāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Nadī^eb^ti cettha mahāsaro adhippeto. ^b^Jaggato^eb^ti hatthiyūthaṃ pālentassa. ^b^Bhiṅkovā^eb^ti hatthipotako viya. ^b^Mamānukubba^eb^nti maṃ anukaronto.

[03]^b^347^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dūteyya^eb^nti ^a^M3.0417^ea^ dūtakammaṃ. ^b^Gantumarahatī^eb^ti dūteyyasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ harituṃ dhāretvā harituṃ arahati. ^b^Sotā^eb^ti yaṃ assa sāsanaṃ denti, tassa sotā. ^b^Sāvetā^eb^ti taṃ uggaṇhitvā ‘‘idaṃ nāma tumhehi vutta’’nti paṭisāvetā. ^b^Uggahetā^eb^ti suuggahitaṃ katvā uggahetā. ^b^Dhāretā^eb^ti sudhāritaṃ katvā dhāretā. ^b^Viññātā^eb^ti attanā tassa atthaṃ jānitā. ^b^Viññāpetā^eb^ti paraṃ vijānāpetā. ^b^Sahitāsahitassā^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ sahitaṃ, idaṃ asahita’’nti evaṃ sahitāsahitassa ^b^kusalo^eb^ upagatānupagatesu cheko sāsanaṃ ārocento sahitāsahitaṃ sallakkhetvā āroceti. ^b^Na byathatī^eb^ti na vedhati na chambhati. ^b^Uggavādini^eb^nti pharusavacanena samannāgataṃ. ^b^Pucchito^eb^ti paṭiññatthāya pucchito.

[03]^b^348^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehī^eb^tiādīsu ^b^asaddhammehī^eb^ti (itivu. aṭṭha. 89) asataṃ dhammehi, asantehi vā asobhanehi vā dhammehi. ^b^Abhibhūto^eb^ti ajjhotthaṭo. ^b^Pariyādinnacitto^eb^ti khepitacitto lābhādihetukena icchācārena mānamadādinā ca khayaṃ pāpitakusalacitto. Atha vā ^b^pariyādinnacitto^eb^ti parito ādinnacitto, vuttappakārena akusalakoṭṭhāsena yathā kusalacittassa uppattivāro na hoti, evaṃ samantato gahitacittasantānoti attho. Apāye nibbattanārahatāya ^b^āpāyiko^eb^. Tatthapi avīcisaṅkhāte mahāniraye uppajjatīti ^b^nerayiko^eb^. Ekaṃ antarakappaṃ paripuṇṇameva katvā tattha tiṭṭhatīti ^b^kappaṭṭho. Atekiccho^eb^ti buddhehipi anivattanīyattā avīcinibbattiyā tikicchābhāvato atekiccho, atikicchanīyoti attho. ^b^Lābhenā^eb^ti lābhena hetubhūtena. Atha vā lābhahetukena mānādinā. Lābhañhi nissāya idhekacce puggalā pāpicchā icchāpakatā icchācāre ṭhatvā ‘‘lābhaṃ nibbattessāmā’’ti anekavihitaṃ anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjitvā ito cutā apāyesu nibbattanti. Apare yathālābhaṃ labhitvā taṃnimittaṃ mānātimānamadamacchariyādivasena pamādaṃ āpajjitvā ito cutā apāyesu nibbattanti, ayañca tādiso. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘lābhena, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko’’tiādi. ^b^Asakkārenā^eb^ti hīḷetvā paribhavitvā parehi attani pavattitena ^a^M3.0418^ea^ asakkārena, asakkārahetukena vā mānādinā. Asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyena pavattā pāpā icchā etassāti pāpiccho, tassa bhāvo ^b^pāpicchatā,^eb^^a^V3.0381^ea^ tāya. ‘‘Ahaṃ buddho bhavissāmi, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī’’ti hi tassa icchā uppannā. Kokālikādayo pāpā lāmakā mittā etassāti pāpamitto, tassa bhāvo ^b^pāpamittatā,^eb^ tāya.
[03]^b^349^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhibhuyyā^eb^ti abhibhavitvā madditvā.

[03]^b^350^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tīhi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehī^eb^tiādi vuttanayameva. ^b^Oramattakena visesādhigamena antarā vosānaṃ āpādī^eb^ti ettha pana ayamattho. ^b^Oramattakenā^eb^ti appamattakena jhānābhiññāmattena. ^b^Visesādhigamenā^eb^ti uttarimanussadhammādhigamena. ^b^Antarā^eb^ti vemajjhe. ^b^Vosānaṃ āpādī^eb^ti akatakiccova samāno ‘‘katakiccomhī’’ti maññamāno samaṇadhammato vigamaṃ āpajji. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – jhānābhiññāhi uttarikaraṇīye adhigantabbe maggaphale anadhigate satiyeva taṃ anadhigantvā samaṇadhammato vigamaṃ āpajjīti. Iti bhagavā iminā suttena visesato puthujjanabhāve ādīnavaṃ pakāseti ‘‘bhāriyo puthujjanabhāvo, yatra hi nāma jhānābhiññāpariyosānā sampattiyo nibbattetvāpi anekānatthāvahaṃ nānāvidhadukkhahetuasantaguṇasambhāvanaṃ asappurisasaṃsaggaṃ ālasiyānuyogañca avijahanto avīcisaṃvattanikaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ atekicchaṃ kibbisaṃ pasavatī’’ti.

[03]Gāthāsu ^b^mā^eb^ti paṭisedhe nipāto. ^b^Jātū^eb^ti ekaṃsena. ^b^Kocī^eb^ti sabbasaṅgāhakavacanaṃ. ^b^Lokasmi^eb^nti sattaloke. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – imasmiṃ sattaloke koci puggalo ekaṃsena pāpiccho mā hotūti. ^b^Tadamināpi jānātha, pāpicchānaṃ yathā gatī^eb^ti pāpicchānaṃ puggalānaṃ yathāgati yādisī nibbatti yādiso abhisamparāyoti imināpi kāraṇena jānāthāti devadattaṃ nidassento evamāha.

[03]^b^Paṇḍitoti samaññāto^eb^ti pariyattibāhusaccena paṇḍitoti ñāto. ^b^Bhāvitattoti sammato^eb^ti jhānābhiññāhi bhāvitacittoti sambhāvito. Tathā hi so ‘‘mahiddhiko godhiputto, mahānubhāvo godhiputto’’ti ^a^M3.0419^ea^ dhammasenāpatināpi pasaṃsito ahosi. ^b^Jalaṃva yasasā aṭṭhā, devadattoti vissuto^eb^ti attano kittiyā parivārena ca jalanto viya obhāsanto viya ṭhito devadattoti evaṃ vissuto pākaṭo ahosi. ‘‘Me suta’’ntipi pāṭho, mayā sutaṃ sutamattaṃ, katipāheneva atathābhūtattā tassa taṃ paṇḍiccādisavanamattamevāti attho.

[03]^b^So^eb^^a^V3.0382^ea^^b^pamādaṃ anuciṇṇo, āsajja naṃ tathāgata^eb^nti so evaṃbhūto devadatto ‘‘buddhopi sākiyaputto, ahampi sākiyaputto, buddhopi samaṇo, ahampi samaṇo, buddhopi iddhimā, ahampi iddhimā, buddhopi dibbacakkhuko, dibbasotacetopariyañāṇalābhī, buddhopi atītānāgatapaccuppanne dhamme jānāti, ahampi te jānāmī’’ti attano pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā sammāsambuddhaṃ attanā samasamaṭṭhapanena pamādaṃ āpajjanto ‘‘idānāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmi, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī’’ti abhimārapayojanādinā tathāgataṃ āsajja āsādetvā viheṭhetvā. ‘‘Pamādamanujiṇṇo’’tipi paṭhanti. Tassattho – pamādaṃ vuttanayena pamajjanto pamādaṃ nissāya bhagavatā saddhiṃ yugaggāhacittuppādena saheva jhānābhiññāhi anujiṇṇo parihīnoti. ^b^Avīcinirayaṃ patto, catudvāraṃ bhayānaka^eb^nti jālānaṃ tattha uppannasattānaṃ vā nirantaratāya ‘‘avīcī’’ti laddhanāmaṃ catūsu passesu catumahādvārayogena catudvāraṃ atibhayānakaṃ mahānirayaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena patto. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
[21]‘‘Catukkaṇṇo catudvāro, vibhatto bhāgaso mito;
[22]Ayopākārapariyanto, ayasā paṭikujjito.
[21]‘‘Tassa ayomayā bhūmi, jalitā tejasā yutā;
[22]Samantā yojanasataṃ, pharitvā tiṭṭhati sabbadā’’ti. (ma. ni. 3.250, 267; a. ni. 3.36);

[03]^b^Aduṭṭhassā^eb^ti aduṭṭhacittassa. ^b^Dubbhe^eb^ti dusseyya. ^b^Tameva pāpaṃ phusatī^eb^ti tameva aduṭṭhadubbhiṃ pāpapuggalaṃ pāpaṃ nihīnaṃ pāpaphalaṃ phusati pāpuṇāti abhibhavati. ^b^Bhesmā^eb^ti vipulabhāvena gambhīrabhāvena ca bhiṃsāpano, bhiṃsāpento viya vipulagambhīroti attho. ^b^Vādenā^eb^ti dosena. ^b^Upahiṃsatī^eb^ti bādhati āsādeti. ^b^Vādo tamhi na rūhatī^eb^ti tasmiṃ tathāgate ^a^M3.0420^ea^ parena āropiyamāno doso na ruhati na tiṭṭhati, visakumbho viya samuddassa na tassa vikāraṃ janetīti attho.

[03]Evaṃ chahi gāthāhi pāpicchatādisamannāgatassa nirayūpagabhāvadassanena dukkhato aparimuttiṃ dassetvā idāni tappaṭipakkhadhammasamannāgatassa dukkhakkhayaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tādisaṃ mitta’’^eb^nti osānagāthamāha. Tassattho – ^b^yassa^eb^ sammā paṭipannassa ^b^maggānugo^eb^ paṭipattimaggaṃ anugato sammā paṭipanno appicchatādiguṇasamannāgamena sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa ^b^khayaṃ^eb^ pariyosānaṃ ^a^V3.0383^ea^ pāpuṇeyya, tādisaṃ buddhaṃ buddhasāvakaṃ vā ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ sappañño attano ^b^mittaṃ kubbetha^eb^ tena mettiṃ kareyya, ^b^tañca sevetha^eb^ tameva payirupāseyyāti.
[03]Kiṃ panetaṃ suttaṃ devadattassa nirayūpapattito pubbe bhāsitaṃ, udāhu pacchāti? ^b^Itivuttakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (itivu. aṭṭha. 89) tāva –

[08]‘‘Devadatte hi avīcimahānirayaṃ paviṭṭhe devadattapakkhikā aññatitthiyā ‘samaṇena gotamena abhisapito devadatto pathaviṃ paviṭṭho’ti abbhācikkhiṃsu. Taṃ sutvā sāsane anabhippasannā manussā ‘siyā nu kho etadevaṃ, yathā ime bhaṇantī’ti āsaṅkaṃ uppādesuṃ. Taṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Atha kho bhagavā ‘na, bhikkhave, tathāgatā kassaci abhisapaṃ denti, tasmā na devadatto mayā abhisapito, attano kammeneva nirayaṃ paviṭṭho’ti vatvā tesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ paṭisedhento imāya aṭṭhuppattiyā idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsī’’ti –

[07]Vuttaṃ, tasmā tesaṃ matena tassa nirayūpapattito pacchāpi bhagavā idaṃ suttamabhāsīti veditabbaṃ. Idha pana tassa nirayūpapattito paṭhamameva uppanne vatthumhi bhāsitaṃ pāḷiāruḷhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva ‘‘avīcinirayaṃ patto’’ti idaṃ pana āsaṃsāyaṃ atītavacananti vuttaṃ, ^b^āsaṃsā^eb^ti cettha avassambhāvinī atthasiddhi adhippetā. Avassambhāviniñhi atthasiddhimapekkhitvā anāgatampi bhūtaṃ viya voharanti, tañca saddalakkhaṇānusārena veditabbaṃ.
[06]Saṅghabhedakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^351^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upālipañhe ^a^M3.0421^ea^ yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitameva. Tattha ^b^anunayanto^eb^ti anujānāpento, bhedassa anurūpaṃ vā bodhento, yathā bhedo hoti, evaṃ bhinditabbe bhikkhū viññāpentoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na tumhāka’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^352^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthumhi dasa akusalakammapathā saṃkiliṭṭhadhammatāya vodānadhammapaapakkhattā ‘‘adhammo’’ti dassitā, tathā upādānādayo, bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ ekantānavajjabhāvato ^a^V3.0384^ea^ natthi adhammabhāvo, bhagavatā pana desitākārena hāpetvā vaḍḍhetvā vā kathanaṃ yathādhammaṃ akathananti katvā adhammabhāvoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘tayo satipaṭṭhānā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Niyyānika^eb^nti sapāṭihīraṃ appaṭihataṃ hutvā pavattatīti attho. ^b^Tathevā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘evaṃ amhāka’’ntiādinā vuttamatthaṃ ākaḍḍhati. ^b^Kātabbaṃ kammaṃ dhammo nāmā^eb^ti yathādhammaṃ karaṇato ^b^dhammo^eb^ nāma, itaraṃ vuttavipariyāyato ^b^adhammo^eb^ nāma.

[03]^b^Rāgavinayo…pe… ayaṃ vinayo nāmā^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ vinayanato saṃvaraṇato pajahanato paṭisaṅkhānato ca ^b^vinayo^eb^ nāma, vuttavipariyāyena itaro ^b^avinayo^eb^. Vatthusampattiādivasena sabbesaṃ vinayakammānaṃ akuppatāti āha ^b^‘‘vatthusampatti…pe… ayaṃ vinayo nāmā’’^eb^ti. Tappaṭipakkhato ^b^avinayo^eb^ veditabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vatthuvipattī’’^eb^tiādi. Yāsaṃ āpannassa pabbajjā sāvasesā, tā āpattiyo ^b^sāvasesā^eb^.

[03]^b^354^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āpāyiko^eb^tiādigāthāsu (itivu. aṭṭha. 18) saṅghassa bhedasaṅkhāte vagge ratoti ^b^vaggarato^eb^. Adhammikatāya adhamme bhedakaravatthumhi saṅghabhedasaṅkhāte eva ca adhamme ṭhitoti ^b^adhammaṭṭho. Yogakkhemā padhaṃsatī^eb^ti hitato parihāyati, catūhipi yogehi anupaddutattā ^b^yogakkhemaṃ^eb^ nāma arahattaṃ nibbānañca, tato panassa dhaṃsane vattabbameva natthi. Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññato saṅghataṭṭhena ^b^saṅghaṃ,^eb^ tato eva ^a^M3.0422^ea^ ekakammādividhānayogena ^b^samaggaṃ^eb^ sahitaṃ ^b^bhinditvā^eb^ pubbe vuttalakkhaṇena saṅghabhedena bhinditvā. ^b^Kappa^eb^nti antarakappasaṅkhātaṃ āyukappaṃ. ^b^Nirayamhī^eb^ti avīcimahānirayamhi.

[03]^b^Sukhā saṅghassa sāmaggī^eb^ti (itivu. aṭṭa. 19) sukhassa paccayabhāvato sāmaggī ‘‘sukhā’’ti vuttā yathā ‘‘sukho buddhānamuppādo’’ti (dha. pa. 194). ^b^Samaggānañcanuggaho^eb^ti samaggānaṃ sāmaggianumodanena anuggaṇhanaṃ sāmaggianurūpaṃ vā, yathā te sāmaggiṃ na vijahanti, tathā gahaṇaṃ ṭhapanaṃ anubalappadānanti attho. ^b^Samaggaṃ katvānā^eb^ti bhinnaṃ saṅghaṃ saṅgharājippattaṃ vā samaggaṃ sahitaṃ katvā. ^b^Kappa^eb^nti āyukappameva. ^b^Saggamhi modatī^eb^ti kāmāvacaradevaloke aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi abhibhavitvā dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanto icchitanibbattiyā ca modati pamodati laḷati kīḷati.

[03]^b^355^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Siyā nu kho, bhante, saṅghabhedako^eb^tiādi pāḷianusāreneva veditabbaṃ. ‘‘Pañcahi, upāli, ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā’’ti ^a^V3.0385^ea^ evaṃ ^b^parivāre^eb^ (pari. 458) āgatampi saṅghabhedalakkhaṇaṃ idha vuttena kiṃ nānākaraṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘parivāre panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ettha ca sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghe asannipatite visuṃ parisaṃ gahetvā katavohārānussāvanasalākaggāhassa kammaṃ vā karontassa uddesaṃ vā uddisantassa bhedo ca hoti ānantariyakammañca. Samaggasaññāya pana ‘‘vaṭṭatī’’ti saññāya vā karontassa bhedova hoti, na ānantariyakammaṃ. Tato ūnaparisāya karontassa neva saṅghabhedo na ānantariyaṃ. Sabbantimena hi paricchedena navannaṃ janānaṃ yo saṅghaṃ bhindati, tassa ānantariyakammaṃ hoti, anuvattakānaṃ adhammavādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ kammaṃ, dhammavādino anavajjā. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
[06]Upālipañhakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Saṅghabhedakakkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^356-357^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vattakkhandhake ^a^M3.0423^ea^^a^V3.0386^ea^^b^uparipiṭṭhito^eb^ti piṭṭhisaṅghāṭassa uparibhāgato, dvārabāhassa uparipadesatoti attho. ^b^Vissajjetabba^eb^nti sukkhāpanatthaṃ ātape vissajjitabbaṃ. ^b^Abhivādāpetabbo^eb^ti tassa vasse pucchite yadi daharo hoti, sayameva vandissati, tadā imināva vandāpito nāma hoti. ^b^Nilloketabbo^eb^ti oloketabbo. ^b^Yathābhāga^eb^nti pubbe paññattaṃ padesabhāgaṃ anatikkamitvā. ^b^Santānaka^eb^nti uṇṇanābhisuttaṃ. ^b^Ullokā^eb^ti gehassa uparibhāgato paṭṭhāya, paṭhamaṃ uparibhāgo sammajjitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
[03]^b^359^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahāāvāse^eb^ti mahāvihārasadise mahāāvāse.
[03]^b^362^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pañcame nisinne^eb^ti anumodanatthāya nisinne. ^b^Upanisinnakathā^eb^ nāma bahūsu sannipatitesu parikathākathanaṃ.

[03]^b^364^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Manussānaṃ parivisanaṭṭhāna^eb^nti yattha manussā saputtadārā āvasitvā denti. ^b^Hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti bhuttāvissa bhojanāvasāne hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘antarā pipāsitena pana…pe… hatthā na dhovitabbā’’^eb^ti. Potthakesu pana ‘‘pānīyaṃ pivitvā ^a^V3.0387^ea^ hatthā na dhovitabbā’’ti likhanti, ‘‘hatthā dhovitabbā’’ti pāṭhena bhavitabbanti amhākaṃ khanti. Aññathā ‘‘na tāva udakanti idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vutta’’nti vatvā ‘‘antarā pipāsitena panā’’tiādinā vuttaviseso na upalabbhati. Atha mataṃ ^b^‘‘na tāva therena udakaṃ paṭiggahetabba^eb^nti idaṃ kiṃ pānīyapaṭiggahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, udāhu hatthadhovanaudakaggahaṇaṃ sandhāyāti āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ ‘idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya ^a^M3.0424^ea^ vutta’ntiādi kathita’’nti, tañca na, tattha āsaṅkāya eva asambhavato. Na hi bhagavā ‘‘yāva aññe na bhuttāvino honti, tāva pānīyaṃ na pātabba’’nti vakkhatīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Yadi cetaṃ pānīyapaṭiggahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ‘‘na tāva therena udakaṃ paṭiggahetabba’’nti udakasaddappayogo ca na kattabbo siyā, aṭṭhakathāyañca ‘‘idaṃ hatthadhovanaudakaṃ sandhāya vutta’’nti vatvā tena nivattitabbamatthaṃ dassentena ‘‘antarā pipāsitena pana gale vilaggāmisena vā pānīyaṃ pivitabba’’nti ettakameva vattabbaṃ, ‘‘pānīyaṃ pivitvā hatthā na dhovitabbā’’ti evaṃ pana na vattabbanti. ^b^Dhure nisinnā hontī^eb^ti dvārasamīpe nisinnā honti.
[03]^b^366^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Parāmasatī^eb^ti gaṇhāti. ^b^Ṭhapeti vā^eb^ti ‘‘tiṭṭhatha, bhante’’ti vadantī ṭhapeti nāma.
[03]^b^367^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kenajja, bhante, yutta^eb^nti kena nakkhattena ajja cando yuttoti evaṃ vadantena nakkhattaṃ pucchitaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^369-370^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṅgaṇe^eb^ti abbhokāse. ^b^Na vuḍḍhaṃ anāpucchā^eb^ti ettha tassa ovarake tadupacāre ca āpucchitabbanti vadanti. ^b^Bhojanasālādīsupi evameva paṭipajjitabba^eb^nti bhojanasālādīsupi uddesadānādi āpucchitvāva kātabbanti attho.

[03]^b^373-374^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Idaṃ^eb^^a^V3.0388^ea^^b^ativivaṭa^eb^nti idaṃ ṭhānaṃ gumbādīhi appaṭicchannattā ativiya pakāsanaṃ. ^b^Nibaddhagamanatthāyā^eb^ti attano nibaddhagamanatthāya. ^b^Puggalikaṭṭhānaṃ vā^eb^ti attano vihāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.

[03]Imasmiṃ ^a^M3.0425^ea^ vattakkhandhake āgatāni āgantukāvāsikagamiyānumodanabhattaggapiṇḍacārikāraññika senāsana jantāghara vaccakuṭi upajjhācariya saddhivihārika antevāsikavattāni ^b^cuddasa mahāvattāni^eb^ nāma, ito aññāni pana kadāci tajjanīyakammakatādikāleyeva caritabbāni ^b^asīti khandhakavattānī^eb^ti veditabbāni. ^b^Gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ pana ‘‘imāniyeva cuddasa mahāvattāni aggahitaggahaṇena gahiyamānāni asīti khandhakavattāānī’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
[06]Vattakkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^383^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pātimokkhaṭṭhapanakkhandhake ^a^M3.0426^ea^^a^V3.0389^ea^^b^tadahū^eb^ti (udā. aṭṭha. 45) tasmiṃ ahani tasmiṃ divase. ^b^Uposathe^eb^ti ettha upavasanti etthāti ^b^uposatho, upavasantī^eb^ti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho. Ayañhi ^b^uposatha^eb^-saddo ‘‘aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasāmī’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 3.71; 10.46) sīle āgato. ‘‘Uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā’’tiādīsu (mahāva. 155) pātimokkhuddesādivinayakamme. ‘‘Gopālakūposatho nigaṇṭhūposatho’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 3.71) upavāse. ‘‘Uposatho nāma nāgarājā’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.246; ma. ni. 3.258) paññattiyaṃ. ‘‘Ajjuposatho pannaraso’’tiādīsu (mahāva. 168) divase. Idhāpi divaseyeva daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā ^b^tadahuposathe^eb^ti tasmiṃ uposathadivasabhūte ahanīti attho. ^b^Nisinno hotī^eb^ti mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ upāsikāya ratanapāsāde nisinno hoti. Nisajja pana bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni olokento ekaṃ dussīlapuggalaṃ disvā ‘‘sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ puggale idha nisinneyeva pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi, sattadhāvassa muddhā phalissatī’’ti tasmiṃ anukampāya tuṇhīyeva ahosi.

[03]^b^Abhikkantā^eb^ti atikkantā parikkhīṇā. ^b^Uddhaste aruṇe^eb^ti uggate aruṇasīse. ^b^Nandimukhiyā^eb^ti tuṭṭhimukhiyā. ^b^Uddhastaṃ aruṇa^eb^nti aruṇuggamanaṃ patvāpi ‘‘uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha’’nti thero bhagavantaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ yāci tasmiṃ kāle ‘‘na, bhikkhave, anuposathe uposatho kātabbo’’ti (mahāva. 183) sikkhāpadassa apaññattattā. ^b^Aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā^eb^ti tikkhattuṃ therena pātimokkhuddesassa yācitattā anuddesassa kāraṇaṃ kathento ‘‘asukapuggalo aparisuddho’’ti avatvā ‘‘aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā’’ti āha ^a^V3.0390^ea^. Kasmā pana bhagavā tiyāmarattiṃ tathā vītināmesi? Tato paṭṭhāya ovādapātimokkhaṃ anuddisitukāmo tassa vatthuṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ.

[03]^b^Addasā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0427^ea^ kathaṃ addasa. Attano cetopariyañāṇena tassaṃ parisati bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni parijānanto tassa purisassa dussīlyacittaṃ passi. Yasmā pana citte diṭṭhe taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo diṭṭho nāma hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ dussīla’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Yatheva hi anāgate sattasu divasesu pavattaṃ paresaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇalābhī pajānāti, evaṃ atītepīti. ^b^Dussīla^eb^nti nissīlaṃ, sīlavirahitanti attho. ^b^Pāpadhamma^eb^nti dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya lāmakasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Asuci^eb^nti aparisuddhehi kāyakammādīhi samannāgatattā na suciṃ. ^b^Saṅkassarasamācāra^eb^nti kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā ‘‘idaṃ iminā kataṃ bhavissatī’’ti evaṃ paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyatāya saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ. Atha vā kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā ‘‘kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī’’ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāraṃ. Lajjitabbatāya paṭicchādetabbassa karaṇato paṭicchannaṃ kammantaṃ etassāti ^b^paṭicchannakammantaṃ^eb^. Kucchitasamaṇavesadhāritāya na samaṇanti ^b^assamaṇaṃ^eb^. Salākaggahaṇādīsu ‘‘kittakā samaṇā’’ti gaṇanāya ‘‘ahampi samaṇomhī’’ti micchāpaṭiññāya ^b^samaṇapaṭiññaṃ^eb^. Aseṭṭhacāritāya ^b^abrahmacāriṃ^eb^. Aññe brahmacārino sunivatthe supārute kusumbhakapaṭadhare gāmanigamādīsu piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappente disvā abrahmacārī samāno sayampi tādisena ākārena paṭipajjanto uposathādīsu ca sandissanto ‘‘ahampi brahmacārī’’ti paṭiññaṃ dento viya hotīti ^b^brahmacāripaṭiññaṃ^eb^. Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā ^b^antopūtiṃ^eb^. Chahi dvārehi rāgādikilesāvassavena tintattā ^b^avassutaṃ^eb^. Sañjātarāgādikacavarattā sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca ^b^kasambujātaṃ. Majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinna^eb^nti saṅghapariyāpanno viya bhikkhusaṅghassa anto nisinnaṃ.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhosī^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ na pakatatto’’ti bhagavatā diṭṭho asi. Yasmā ca evaṃ diṭṭho, tasmā natthi te tava bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāso. Yasmā pana so saṃvāso tava natthi, tasmā uṭṭhehi āvusoti evamettha padayojanā veditabbā. ^b^Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosī^eb^ti anekavāraṃ vatvāpi ‘‘thero sayameva nibbinno oramissati, idāni imesaṃ paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī’’ti vā adhippāyena tuṇhī ^a^M3.0428^ea^ ahosi. ^b^Bāhāyaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘bhagavatā mayā ca yāthāvato diṭṭho, yāvatatiyaṃ ‘uṭṭhehī’ti ca vutto na uṭṭhāti, idānissa nikkaḍḍhanakālo ^a^V3.0391^ea^, mā saṅghassa uposathantarāyo ahosī’’ti bāhāyaṃ aggahesi. ^b^Bahi dvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvā^eb^ti dvārakoṭṭhakā dvārasālato nikkhāmetvā, ^b^bahī^eb^ti pana nikkhāmitaṭṭhānadassanaṃ. Atha vā ^b^bahidvārakoṭṭhakā^eb^ti bahidvārakoṭṭhakatopi nikkhāmetvā, na antodvārakoṭṭhakato eva. Ubhayathāpi vihārato bahikatvāti attho. ^b^Sūcighaṭikaṃ datvā^eb^ti aggaḷasūciñca uparighaṭikañca ādahitvā, suṭṭhu kavāṭaṃ thaketvāti attho. ^b^Yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāmā^eb^ti ‘‘aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā’’ti vacanaṃ sutvā eva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamissati, acchariyamidanti dasseti. Idañca garahaṇacchariyamevāti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^384^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde^eb^ti (udā. aṭṭha. 45) ko anusandhi? Yvāyaṃ aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhassa anuddeso, so imasmiṃ dhammavinaye acchariyo abbhuto dhammoti taṃ aparehi sattahi acchariyaabbhutadhammehi saddhiṃ vibhajitvā dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva tesaṃ upamābhāvena mahāsamudde acchariyaabbhutadhamme dassento satthā ^b^‘‘aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Asurā^eb^ti devā viya na suranti na īsanti na virocantīti asurā. Surā nāma devā, tesaṃ paṭipakkhāti vā ^b^asurā,^eb^ vepacittipahārādādayo. Tesaṃ bhavanaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhābhāge, te tattha pavisantā nikkhamantā sinerupāde maṇḍapādīni nimminitvā kīḷantāva abhiramanti. Sā tattha tesaṃ abhirati ime guṇe disvāti āha ^b^‘‘ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramantī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^abhiramantī^eb^ti ratiṃ vindanti, anukkaṇṭhamānā vasantīti attho.

[03]^b^Anupubbaninno^eb^tiādīni sabbāni anupaṭipāṭiyā ninnabhāvasseva vevacanāni. ^b^Na āyatakeneva papāto^eb^ti nacchinnataṭamahāsobbho viya ādito ^a^M3.0429^ea^ eva papāto. So hi tīradesato paṭṭhāya ekaṅguladvaṅgulavidatthiratanayaṭṭhiusabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutaaḍḍhayojanayojanādivasena gambhīro hutvā gacchanto gacchanto sinerupādamūle caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro hutvā ṭhitoti dasseti.

[03]^b^Ṭhitadhammo^eb^ti ṭhitasabhāvo avaṭṭhitasabhāvo. ^b^Kuṇapenā^eb^ti yena kenaci hatthiassādikaḷevarena. ^b^Vāhetī^eb^ti hatthena gahetvā viya vīcippahāreneva thale khipati. ^b^Gaṅgā yamunā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0392^ea^ anotattadahassa dakkhiṇamukhato nikkhantanadī pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne gaṅgātiādinā pañcadhā saṅkhaṃ gatā. Tattha ^b^nadī ninnagā^eb^tiādikaṃ gottaṃ, ^b^gaṅgā yamunā^eb^tiādikaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^Savantiyo^eb^ti yā kāci savamānā sandamānā gacchantiyo mahānadiyo vā kunnadiyo vā. ^b^Appentī^eb^ti allīyanti osaranti. ^b^Dhārā^eb^ti vuṭṭhidhārā. ^b^Pūratta^eb^nti puṇṇabhāvo. Mahāsamuddassa hi ayaṃ dhammatā – ‘‘imasmiṃ kāle devo mando jāto, jālakkhipādīni ādāya macchakacchape gaṇhissāmī’’ti vā ‘‘imasmiṃ kāle atimahantā vuṭṭhi, labhissāma nu kho piṭṭhipasāraṇaṭṭhāna’’nti vā na sakkā vattuṃ. Paṭhamakappikakālato paṭṭhāya hi tīraṃ bhassitvā sinerumekhalaṃ āhacca udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ, tato ekaṅgulamattampi udakaṃ neva heṭṭhā otarati, na uddhaṃ uttarati. ^b^Ekaraso^eb^ti asambhinnaraso.

[03]^b^Muttā^eb^ti khuddakamahantavaṭṭadīghādibhedā anekavidhamuttā. ^b^Maṇī^eb^ti rattanīlādibhedo anekavidho maṇi. ^b^Veḷuriyo^eb^ti vaṃsavaṇṇasirīsapupphavaṇṇādisaṇṭhānato anekavidho. ^b^Saṅkho^eb^ti dakkhiṇāvaṭṭakatumbakucchidhamanasaṅkhādibhedo anekavidho. ^b^Silā^eb^ti setakāḷamuggavaṇṇādibhedā anekavidhā. ^b^Pavāḷampi^eb^ khuddakamahantarattaghanarattādibhedaṃ anekavidhaṃ. ^b^Lohitako^eb^ padumarāgādibhedo anekavidho. ^b^Masāragallaṃ^eb^ kabaramaṇi. Cittaphalikantipi vadanti. ^b^Mahataṃ bhūtāna^eb^nti mahantānaṃ sattānaṃ. ^b^Timi timiṅgalo timitimiṅgalo^eb^ti tisso macchajātiyo. Timiṃ gilanasamattho ^b^timiṅgalo,^eb^ timiñca timiṅgalañca gilanasamattho timitimiṅgaloti vadanti. ^b^Nāgā^eb^ti ūmipiṭṭhivāsinopi vimānaṭṭhakanāgāpi.

[03]^b^385^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evameva^eb^^a^M3.0430^ea^^b^kho^eb^ti kiñcāpi satthā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye soḷasapi bāttiṃsapi tato bhiyyopi acchariyabbhutadhamme vibhajitvā dassetuṃ sakkoti, upamābhāvena pana gahitānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ anurūpavasena aṭṭheva te upametabbadhamme vibhajitvā dassanto ^b^‘‘evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā’’^eb^ti āha. Tattha ^b^anupubbasikkhāya^eb^ tisso sikkhā gahitā, ^b^anupubbakiriyāya^eb^ terasa dhutadhammā, ^b^anupubbapaṭipadāya^eb^ satta anupassanā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā ca gahitā. ^b^Na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho^eb^ti maṇḍūkassa uppatitvā gamanaṃ viya āditova sīlapūraṇādīni akatvā arahattapaṭivedho nāma natthi, paṭipāṭiyā pana sīlasamādhipaññāyo pūretvāva arahattappattīti attho.

[03]^b^Mama^eb^^a^V3.0393^ea^^b^sāvakā^eb^ti sotāpannādike ariyapuggale sandhāya vadati. ^b^Na saṃvasatī^eb^ti uposathakammādivasena saṃvāsaṃ na karoti. ^b^Ukkhipatī^eb^ti apaneti. ^b^Ārakāvā^eb^ti dūre eva. ^b^Tathāgatappavedite^eb^ti tathāgatena bhagavatā sāvakesu desite akkhāte pakāsite. ^b^Na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vā^eb^ti asaṅkhyeyyepi mahākappe buddhesu anuppajjantesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ na sakkoti, tadāpi ‘‘tucchā nibbānadhātū’’ti na sakkā vattuṃ, buddhakāle pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi sattā amataṃ ārādhenti, tadāpi na sakkā vattuṃ ‘‘pūrā nibbānadhātū’’ti. ^b^Vimuttiraso^eb^ti kilesehi vimuccanaraso. Sabbā hi sāsanasampatti yāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittassa vimuttīti attho.
[03]^b^Ratanānī^eb^ti ratijananaṭṭhena ratanāni. Satipaṭṭhānādayo hi bhāviyamānā pubbabhāgepi anekavidhaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ nibbattenti, pageva aparabhāge. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Yato yato sammasati, khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ;
[22]Labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata’’nti. (dha. pa. 374);
[07]Lokiyaratananimittaṃ ^a^M3.0431^ea^ pana pītipāmojjaṃ na tassa kalabhāgampi agghati. Apica –
[21]Cittīkataṃ mahagghañca, atulaṃ dullabhadassanaṃ;
[22]Anomasattaparibhogaṃ, ratananti pavuccati. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.33);

[03]Yadi ca cittīkatādibhāvena ratanaṃ nāma hoti, satipaṭṭhānādīnaññeva bhūto ratanabhāvo. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānañhi so ānubhāvo, yaṃ sāvakā sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ, paccekasambuddhā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ, sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti āsannakāraṇattā. Paramparakāraṇañhi dānādiupanissayoti evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena cittīkatādiatthena ca ratanabhāvo bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ sātisayo. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṃ – cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Ārammaṇe okkanditvā upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṭṭhānaṃ, satiyeva paṭṭhānaṃ ^b^satipaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Ārammaṇassa pana kāyādivasena catubbidhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi kāyavedanācittadhammesu ^a^V3.0394^ea^ subhasukhaniccaattasaññānaṃ pahānato asubhadukkhāniccānattabhāvaggahaṇato ca nesaṃ kāyānupassanādibhāvo vibhatto.

[03]Sammā padahanti etena, sayaṃ vā sammā padahati, pasatthaṃ sundaraṃ vā padahananti ^b^sammappadhānaṃ,^eb^ puggalassa vā sammadeva padhānabhāvakaraṇato ^b^sammappadhānaṃ,^eb^ vīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tampi anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanapahānavasena anuppannuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ uppādanaṭhāpanavasena ca catukiccasādhakattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cattāro sammappadhānā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Ijjhatīti ^b^iddhi,^eb^ samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti tāya vā sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti ^b^iddhi^eb^. Paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādo ^b^iddhipādo,^eb^ iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamupāyoti ^b^iddhipādo^eb^. Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti. Svāyaṃ iddhipādo yasmā chandādike cattāro adhipatidhamme dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattīyati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cattāro iddhipādo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pañcindriyānī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0432^ea^ saddhādīni pañca indriyāni. Tattha assaddhiyaṃ abhibhavitvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti ^b^saddhā indriyaṃ^eb^. Kosajjaṃ abhibhavitvā paggahalakkhaṇe, pamādaṃ abhibhavitvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe, vikkhepaṃ abhibhavitvā avikkhepalakkhaṇe, aññāṇaṃ abhibhavitvā dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti ^b^paññā indriyaṃ^eb^.
[03]Tāniyeva assaddhiyādīhi anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca ^b^balāni^eb^ veditabbāni.

[03]^b^Satta bojjhaṅgā^eb^ti bodhiyā, bodhissa vā aṅgāti ^b^bojjhaṅgā^eb^. Yā hi esā dhammasāmaggī, yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ anekesaṃ upaddavānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtāya satidhammavicayavīriyapītipassaddhisamādhiupekkhāsaṅkhātāya dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhati kilesaniddāya uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti ^b^‘‘bodhī’’^eb^ti vuccati, tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgāti ^b^bojjhaṅgā^eb^ jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya. Yopesa vuttappakārāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako ^b^‘‘bodhī’’^eb^ti vuccati, tassa bodhissa vā aṅgātipi ^b^bojjhaṅgā^eb^ senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu porāṇā ‘‘bujjhanakassa puggalassa ^a^V3.0395^ea^ aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā’’ti (saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.182; vibha. aṭṭha. 466; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 1.1.25), ‘‘bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā’’tiādinā (paṭi. ma. 2.17) nayenapi bojjhaṅgaṭṭho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo^eb^ti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhehi kilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ^b^ariyo^eb^. Sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni assa atthi, aṭṭhaṅgāniyeva vā ^b^aṭṭhaṅgiko^eb^. Mārento kilese gacchati, nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati, sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti ^b^maggo^eb^ti evametesaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ atthavibhāgo veditabbo.

[03]^b^Sotāpanno^eb^ti maggasaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ āpajjitvā pāpuṇitvā ṭhito, sotāpattiphalaṭṭhoti attho. ^b^Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno^eb^ti sotāpattiphalassa attapaccakkhakaraṇatthāya paṭipajjamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho ^a^M3.0433^ea^, yo aṭṭhamakotipi vuccati. ^b^Sakadāgāmī^eb^ti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena āgamanasīlo dutiyaphalaṭṭho. ^b^Anāgāmī^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena kāmalokaṃ anāgamanasīlo tatiyaphalaṭṭho. Yo pana saddhānusārī dhammānusārī ekabījīti evamādiko ariyapuggalavibhāgo, so tesaṃyeva bhedoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^Etamatthaṃ viditvā^eb^ti etaṃ attano dhammavinaye matakuṇapasadisena dussīlapuggalena saddhiṃ saṃvāsābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ viditvā. ^b^Imaṃ udāna^eb^nti imaṃ asaṃvāsārahasaṃvāsārahabhāvānaṃ kāraṇaparidīpanaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
[06]Tattha ^b^channamativassatī^eb^ti āpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādento aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ

[03]Āpajjati, tato aparanti evaṃ āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ ativiya vassati. ^b^Vivaṭaṃ nātivassatī^eb^ti āpattiṃ āpanno taṃ appaṭicchādetvā vivaranto sabrahmacārīnaṃ pakāsento yathādhammaṃ yathāvinayaṃ paṭikaronto desento vuṭṭhahanto aññaṃ navaṃ āpattiṃ nāpajjati, tenassa taṃ vivaṭaṃ puna āpattivassaṃ kilesavassaṃ na vassati. Yasmā ca etadeva, tasmā ^b^channaṃ^eb^ chāditaṃ āpattiṃ vivaretha. ^b^Evaṃ taṃ nātivassatī^eb^ti evaṃ sante taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanapuggalānaṃ attabhāvaṃ ativijjhitvā kilesavassanena na vassati na temeti, evaṃ so kilesehi anavassuto parisuddhasīlo samāhito hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sammasanto anukkamena nibbānaṃ pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo.
[06]Imasmiṃ dhammavinaye aṭṭhacchariyakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^386^eb^^b^.^eb^ Atha ^a^V3.0396^ea^ bhagavā cintesi ‘‘idāni bhikkhusaṅghe abbudo jāto, aparisuddhā puggalā uposathaṃ āgacchanti, na ca tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ uddisati, anuddisante ca bhikkhusaṅghassa uposatho pacchijjati, yannūnāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaññeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya’’nti, evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaññeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāni ^a^M3.0434^ea^. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘atha kho bhagavā…pe… pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāthā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^nadānāha^eb^nti na idāni ahaṃ. Uposathaṃ na karissāmi, pātimokkhaṃ na uddisissāmīti paccekaṃ ^b^na^eb^-kārena sambandho. Duvidhaṃ pātimokkhaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ ovādapātimokkhanti. Tesu ‘‘suṇātu me bhante’’tiādikaṃ ^b^āṇāpātimokkhaṃ,^eb^ taṃ sāvakāva uddisanti, na buddhā, yaṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ uddisīyati. ‘‘Khantī paramaṃ…pe… sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ…pe… anupavādo anupaghāto…pe… etaṃ buddhāna sāsana’’nti (dī. ni. 2.90; dha. pa. 183-185) imā pana tisso gāthā ^b^ovādapātimokkhaṃ^eb^ nāma, taṃ buddhāva uddisanti, na sāvakā. Channampi vassānaṃ accayena uddisanti. Dīghāyukabuddhānañhi dharamānakāle ayameva pātimokkhuddeso, appāyukabuddhānaṃ pana paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva, tato paraṃ itaro, tañca kho bhikkhū eva uddisanti, na buddhā. Tasmā amhākampi bhagavā vīsativassamattaṃ imaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā imaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā tato paraṃ na uddisi.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhāna^eb^nti akāraṇaṃ. ^b^Anavakāso^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Kāraṇañhi tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ‘‘ṭhāna’’nti vuccati, evaṃ ‘‘avakāso’’tipi vuccati. ^b^Ya^eb^nti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. ^b^Na ca, bhikkhave, sāpattikena pātimokkhaṃ sotabba^eb^ntiādi padatthato suviññeyyaṃ. Vinicchayato panettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāya vuttameva. Tattha ^b^pure vā pacchā vā^eb^ti ñattito pubbe vā pacchā vā.
[03]^b^387^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Katañca akatañca ubhayaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti yassa ekantena katāpi atthi, akatāpi atthi, tassa tadubhayaṃ gahetvā.
[03]^b^389^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Parisā^eb^^a^V3.0397^ea^^b^vuṭṭhātī^eb^ti yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ vatthuṃ avinicchinitvā kenaci antarāyena vuṭṭhāti.
[03]^b^393^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccādiyatī^eb^ti pati ādiyati, ‘‘akataṃ kamma’’ntiādinā puna ārabhatīti attho.
[03]^b^398^eb^^b^.^eb^ Paraṃ ^a^M3.0435^ea^ codetuṃ attanā ādātabbaṃ gahetabbaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ^b^attādānaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sāsanaṃ sodhetukāmo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vassāratto^eb^ti vassakālo.

[03]^b^399^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭimāsitu^eb^nti parāmasituṃ. ^b^Palibodhe chinditvā…pe… adhigataṃ mettacitta^eb^nti iminā appanāppattaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ dasseti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘vikkhambhanavasena vihatāghāta’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^400^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^No dosantaro^eb^ti ettha cittapariyāyo ^b^antara^eb^-saddoti āha ^b^‘‘na duṭṭhacitto hutvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^401^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Karuṇa^eb^nti appanāppattaṃ karuṇajjhānaṃ. ^b^Karuṇāpubbabhāga^eb^nti parikammupacāravasappavattaṃ karuṇaṃ. ^b^Mettañca mettāpubbabhāgañcā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Sesamettha suviññeyyamevāti.
[06]Pātimokkhaṭṭhapanakkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^402^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bhikkhunikkhandhake ^a^M3.0436^ea^^a^V3.0398^ea^^b^sakkesu viharatī^eb^ti paṭhamagamanena gantvā viharati. ^b^Mahāpajāpati gotamī^eb^ti ettha ^b^gotamī^eb^ti gottaṃ. Nāmakaraṇadivase panassā laddhasakkārā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā ‘‘sace ayaṃ dhītaraṃ labhissati, cakkavattirañño mahesī bhavissati. Sace puttaṃ labhissati, cakkavattirājā bhavissatīti ubhayathāpi mahatīyevassā pajā bhavissatī’’ti byākariṃsu, tasmā puttapajāya ceva dhītupajāya ca mahantatāya ‘‘mahāpajāpatī’’ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu, idha pana gottena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā ‘‘mahāpajāpati gotamī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti bhagavā kapilapuraṃ gantvā paṭhamameva nandaṃ pabbājesi, sattame divase rāhulakumāraṃ. ^b^Cumbaṭakakalahe^eb^ pana ubhayanagaravāsikesu yuddhatthāya nikkhantesu satthā gantvā te rājāno saññāpetvā ^b^attadaṇḍasuttaṃ^eb^ (su. ni. 941 ādayo) kathesi. Rājāno pasīditvā aḍḍhateyyasate aḍḍhateyyasate dārake adaṃsu. Tāni pañca kumārasatāni satthu santike pabbajiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ pajāpatiyo sāsanaṃ pesetvā anabhiratiṃ uppādayiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ anabhiratiyā uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā te pañcasate daharabhikkhū kuṇāladahaṃ netvā attano kuṇālakāle nisinnapubbe pāsāṇatale nisīditvā ^b^kuṇālajātaka^eb^kathāya (jā. 2.21.kuṇālajātaka) tesaṃ anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā sabbepi te sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi, puna mahāvanaṃ ānetvā arahattaphale. Tesaṃ cittajānanatthaṃ punapi pajāpatiyo sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Te ‘‘abhabbā mayaṃ gharāvāsassā’’ti paṭisāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Tā ‘‘na dāni amhākaṃ paragharaṃ gantuṃ yuttaṃ, mahāpajāpatiyā santikaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā pabbajissāmā’’ti pañcasatāpi mahāpajāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘‘ayye, amhākaṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāpethā’’ti āhaṃsu. Mahāpajāpati ca tā itthiyo gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, setacchattassa heṭṭhā rañño parinibbutakāle upasaṅkamītipi vadantiyeva. ^b^Pakkāmī^eb^ti puna kapilapurameva pāvisi.

[03]^b^Yathābhirantaṃ^eb^^a^M3.0437^ea^^a^V3.0399^ea^^b^viharitvā^eb^ti bodhaneyyasattānaṃ upanissayaṃ olokento yathājjhāsayena viharitvā. ^b^Cārikaṃ pakkāmī^eb^ti mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto uttamāya buddhasiriyā anopamena buddhavilāsena aturitacārikaṃ pakkāmi. ^b^Sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhi^eb^nti antonivesanasmiṃyeva dasabalaṃ uddissa pabbajjāvesaṃ gahetvā tāpi pañcasatā sākiyāniyo pabbajjāvesaṃyeva gāhāpetvā sabbāhipi tāhi sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhiṃ. ^b^Pakkāmī^eb^ti gamanaṃ abhinīhari. Gamanābhinīharaṇakāle panassā ‘‘sukumārā rājitthiyo padasā gantuṃ na sakkhissantī’’ti sākiyakoliyarājāno suvaṇṇasivikāyo upaṭṭhāpayiṃsu, tā pana ‘‘yāne āruyha gacchantīhi satthari agāravo kato hotī’’ti ekapaṇṇāsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ padasāva paṭipajjiṃsu. Rājānopi purato ca pacchato ca ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahāpetvā taṇḍulasappitelādīnaṃ sakaṭāni pūretvā ‘‘gatagataṭṭhāne āhāraṃ paṭiyādethā’’ti purise pesayiṃsu. ^b^Sūnehi pādehī^eb^ti tāsañhi sukhumālattā pādesu eko phoṭo uṭṭheti, eko bhijjati, ubho pādā kaṭakaṭṭhisamparikiṇṇā viya hutvā uddhumātā. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘sūnehi pādehī’’ti. ^b^Bahidvārakoṭṭhake^eb^ti dvārakoṭṭhakassa bahi. Kasmā panevaṃ ṭhitāti? Evaṃ kirassā ahosi ‘‘ahaṃ tathāgatena anuññātā sayameva pabbajjāvesaṃ aggahesiṃ, evaṃ gahitabhāvo ca pana me sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo jāto, sace satthā pabbajjaṃ anujānissati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. Sace nānujānissati, mahatī garahā bhavissatī’’ti vihāraṃ pavisituṃ asakkontī rodamānā aṭṭhāsi. ^b^Kiṃ nu tvaṃ gotamī^eb^ti kiṃ nu rājakulānaṃ vipatti uppannā, kena nu tvaṃ kāraṇena evaṃ vivaṇṇabhāvaṃ pattā sūnehi pādehi…pe… ṭhitāti.

[03]^b^Aññenapi pariyāyenā^eb^ti aññenapi kāraṇena. ^b^Āpādikā^eb^ti saṃvaḍḍhikā, tumhākaṃ hatthapādesu hatthapādakiccaṃ asādhentesu hatthe ca pāde ca vaḍḍhetvā paṭijaggikāti attho. ^b^Posikā^eb^ti divasassa dve tayo vāre nahāpetvā bhojetvā pāyetvā tumhe posesi. ^b^Thaññaṃ pāyesī^eb^ti nandakumāro kira bodhisattato katipāheneva daharataro. Tasmiṃ jāte mahāpajāpati attano puttaṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā ^a^M3.0438^ea^ sayaṃ bodhisattassa dhātikiccaṃ sādhayamānā attano thaññaṃ pāyesi. Taṃ sandhāya thero evamāha. ^b^Sādhu bhante^eb^ti ‘‘bahukārā’’tiādīhi tassā guṇaṃ kathetvā puna pabbajjaṃ yācanto evamāha.
[06]Mahāpajāpatigotamīvatthukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^403^eb^^b^.^eb^ Satthāpi ^a^V3.0400^ea^ ‘‘itthiyo nāma parittasaddhā, ekāyācitamatteyeva pabbajjāya anuññātāya na mama sāsanaṃ garuṃ katvā gaṇhissantī’’ti tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni garuṃ katvā gāhāpetukāmatāya ^b^‘‘sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpati gotamī aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti, sāvassā hotu upasampadā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^sāvassā^eb^ti sā eva assā pabbajjāpi upasampadāpi hotu.

[03]^b^Tadahupasampannassā^eb^ti taṃ divasampi upasampannassa. ^b^Abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabba^eb^nti mānātimānaṃ akatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena abhivādanaṃ, āsanā uṭṭhāya paccuggamanavasena paccuṭṭhānaṃ, dasanakhe samodhānetvā añjalikammaṃ, āsanapaññāpanabījanādikaṃ anucchavikakammasaṅkhātaṃ sāmīcikammañca kattabbaṃ. ^b^Abhikkhuke āvāse^eb^ti yattha vasantiyā anantarāyena ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanārahe ṭhāne ovādadāyako ācariyo natthi, ayaṃ abhikkhuko āvāso nāma, evarūpe āvāse vassaṃ na upagantabbaṃ. ^b^Anvaddhamāsa^eb^nti anuposathikaṃ. ^b^Ovādūpasaṅkamana^eb^nti ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanaṃ. ^b^Diṭṭhenā^eb^ti cakkhunā diṭṭhena. ^b^Sutenā^eb^ti sotena sutena. ^b^Parisaṅkāyā^eb^ti diṭṭhasutavasena parisaṅkitena. ^b^Garudhamma^eb^nti garukaṃ saṅghādisesāpattiṃ. ^b^Pakkhamānatta^eb^nti anūnāni pannarasa divasāni mānattaṃ. ^b^Chasu dhammesū^eb^ti vikālabhojanacchaṭṭhesu sikkhāpadesu. ^b^Sikkhitasikkhāyā^eb^ti ekasikkhampi akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pūritasikkhāya.

[03]^b^Na akkositabbo na paribhāsitabbo^eb^ti dasannaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ aññatarena akkosavatthunā na akkositabbo, bhayupadaṃsanāya kāyaci ^a^M3.0439^ea^ paribhāsāya na paribhāsitabbo. ^b^Ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho^eb^ti ovādānusāsanidhammakathāsaṅkhāto vacanapatho bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu ovaṭo pihito, na bhikkhuniyā koci bhikkhu ovaditabbo vā anusāsitabbo vā, ‘‘bhante porāṇakattherā idañcidañca vattaṃ pūrayiṃsū’’ti evaṃ pana paveṇivasena kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsū^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho anivārito, yathāruciyā ovadantu anusāsantu dhammakathaṃ kathentūti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panesā garudhammakathā mahāvibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03]Ime pana aṭṭha garudhamme satthu santike uggahetvā therena attano ārociyamāne sutvā mahāpajāpatiyā ^a^V3.0401^ea^ tāvamahantaṃ domanassaṃ khaṇena paṭippassambhi. Anotattadahato āhaṭena sītudakassa ghaṭasatena matthake parisittā viya vigatapariḷāhā attamanā hutvā garudhammapaṭiggahaṇena uppannapītipāmojjaṃ āvi karontī ^b^‘‘seyyathāpi, bhante’’^eb^tiādikaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. Tattha ^b^daharo^eb^ti taruṇo. ^b^Yuvā^eb^ti yobbaññabhāve ṭhito. ^b^Maṇḍanakajātiko^eb^ti alaṅkārasabhāvo. Tattha koci taruṇopi yuvā na hoti yathā atitaruṇo. Koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko na hoti yathā upasantasabhāvo ālasiyabyasanādīhi vā abhibhūto, idha pana daharo ceva yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko ca adhippeto, tasmā evamāha. Uppalādīni lokasammatattā vuttāni. Ito paraṃ yaṃ yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitameva.

[03]Tattha ^b^mātugāmassa pabbajitattā^eb^ti idaṃ pañcavassasatato uddhaṃ aṭṭhatvā pañcasuyeva vassasatesu saddhammaṭṭhitiyā kāraṇanidassanaṃ. ^b^Paṭisambhidāpabhedappattakhīṇāsavavaseneva vutta^eb^nti ettha ‘‘paṭisambhidāpattakhīṇāsavaggahaṇena jhānānipi gahitāneva honti. Na hi nijjhānakānaṃ sabbappakārasampatti ijjhatī’’ti ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena vassasahassa^eb^ntiādinā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.161) pana evaṃ vuttaṃ –
[08]‘‘Paṭisambhidāpattehi ^a^M3.0440^ea^ vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsi, chaḷabhiññehi vassasahassaṃ, tevijjehi vassasahassaṃ, sukkhavipassakehi vassasahassaṃ, pātimokkhena vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsī’’ti.
[07]^b^Aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathāyampi^eb^ (a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.130) –

[08]‘‘Buddhānañhi parinibbānato vassasahassameva paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti, tato paraṃ cha abhiññā, tato tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā nibbattenti, gacchante gacchante kāle tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti. Eteneva upāyena anāgāmino sakadāgāmino sotāpannā’’ti –
[07]Vuttaṃ.
[07]^b^Saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana (saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.3.156) –

[08]‘‘Paṭhamabodhiyañhi ^a^V3.0402^ea^ bhikkhū paṭisambhidāpattā ahesuṃ. Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu, chaḷabhiññā ahesuṃ, tato cha abhiññā pattuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu. Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayamattaṃ pāpuṇissanti, tampi asakkontā anāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi asakkontā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi asakkontā sotāpattiphalaṃ, gacchante kāle sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissantī’’ti –
[07]Vuttaṃ.
[03]Yasmā cetaṃ sabbaṃ aññamaññapaṭiviruddhaṃ, tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matameva ācariyena tattha tattha dassitanti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā hi ācariyasseva pubbāparavirodhappasaṅgo siyāti.

[03]^b^Tāniyevā^eb^ti tāniyeva pañca vassasahassāni. Pariyattimūlakaṃ sāsananti āha ^b^‘‘na hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthī’’^eb^tiādi. Pariyattiyā hi antarahitāya paṭipatti antaradhāyati, paṭipattiyā antarahitāya adhigamo antaradhāyati. Kiṃkāraṇā? Ayañhi pariyatti ^a^M3.0441^ea^ paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti, paṭipatti adhigamassa, iti paṭipattitopi pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ. Tattha paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi. Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhakarā bhikkhū bahū honti, ‘‘esa bhikkhu puthujjano’’ti aṅguliṃ pasāretvā dassetabbo hoti, imasmiṃyeva dīpe ekavāraṃ puthujjanabhikkhu nāma nāhosi. Paṭipattipūrakāpi kadāci bahū honti, kadāci appā, iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi. Sāsanaṭṭhitiyā pana pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ. Paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti. Yathā amhākaṃ bodhisatto āḷārassa santike pañcābhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā parikammaṃ pucchi, so ‘‘na jānāmī’’ti āha, tato udakassa santikaṃ gantvā adhigatavisesaṃ saṃsanditvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ pucchi, so ācikkhi, tassa vacanasamanantarameva mahāsatto taṃ sampādesi, evameva paññavā bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti, tasmā pariyattiyā ṭhitāya sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti. Yathāpi mahato taḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakaṃ na ṭhassatīti na vattabbaṃ, udake sati padumādīni pupphāni na pupphissantīti na vattabbaṃ, evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise tepiṭake buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbaṃ, tesu sati ^a^V3.0403^ea^ mahātaḷāke padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti na vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekantato pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Pariyattiyā antarahitāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^pariyattī^eb^ti (a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.130) tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sāṭṭhakathā pāḷi. Yāva sā tiṭṭhati, tāva pariyatti paripuṇṇā nāma hoti. Gacchante gacchante kāle kaliyugarājāno adhammikā honti, tesu adhammikesu tesampi amaccādayo adhammikā honti, tato raṭṭhajanapadavāsinoti tesaṃ adhammikatāya na devo sammā vassati, tato sassāni na sampajjanti, tesu asampajjantesu paccayadāyakā bhikkhusaṅghassa paccaye dātuṃ na sakkonti, bhikkhū paccayehi kilamantā antevāsike saṅgahetuṃ na sakkonti. Gacchante gacchante kāle pariyatti parihāyati, atthavasena dhāretuṃ na sakkonti, pāḷivaseneva ^a^M3.0442^ea^ dhārenti. Tato kāle gacchante pāḷimpi sakalaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkonti, paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ parihāyati, parihāyamānaṃ matthakato paṭṭhāya parihāyati. Paṭhamameva hi mahāpakaraṇaṃ parihāyati, tasmiṃ parihīne yamakaṃ, kathāvatthu, puggalapaññatti, dhātukathā, vibhaṅgo, dhammasaṅgahoti.

[03]Evaṃ abhidhammapiṭake parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya suttantapiṭakaṃ parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi aṅguttaranikāyo parihāyati, tasmimpi paṭhamaṃ ekādasakanipāto…pe… tato ekakanipātoti. Evaṃ aṅguttaranikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya saṃyuttanikāyo parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi mahāvaggo parihāyati, tato saḷāyatanavaggo, khandhakavaggo, nidānavaggo, sagāthāvaggoti. Evaṃ saṃyuttanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya majjhimanikāyo parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi uparipaṇṇāsako parihāyati, tato majjhimapaṇṇāsako, tato mūlapaṇṇāsakoti. Evaṃ majjhimanikāye parihīne matthakato paṭṭhāya dīghanikāyo parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi pāthikavaggo parihāyati, tato mahāvaggo, tato sīlakkhandhavaggoti. Evaṃ dīghanikāye parihīne suttantapiṭakaṃ parihīnaṃ nāma hoti. Vinayapiṭakena saddhiṃ jātakameva dhārenti. Vinayapiṭakañhi lajjino dhārenti, lābhakāmā pana ‘‘suttante kathitepi sallakkhentā natthī’’ti jātakameva dhārenti. Gacchante kāle jātakampi dhāretuṃ na sakkonti. Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ vessantarajātakaṃ parihāyati, tato paṭilomakkamena puṇṇakajātakaṃ, mahānāradajātakanti pariyosāne apaṇṇakajātakaṃ parihāyati, vinayapiṭakameva dhārenti.

[03]Gacchante kāle tampi matthakato paṭṭhāya parihāyati. Paṭhamañhi parivāro parihāyati, tato ^a^V3.0404^ea^ khandhako, bhikkhunīvibhaṅgo, mahāvibhaṅgoti anukkamena uposathakkhandhakamattameva dhārenti. Tadāpi pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yāva pana manussesu catuppadikagāthāpi pavattati, tāva pariyatti anantarahitāva hoti. Yadā saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā ‘‘buddhehi kathitaṃ catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ jānanto imaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhatū’’ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā gaṇhanakaṃ alabhitvā ‘‘ekavāraṃ carāpite nāmaṃ suṇantāpi honti asuṇantāpī’’ti yāvatatiyaṃ carāpetvā gaṇhanakaṃ alabhitvā rājapurisā ^a^M3.0443^ea^ sahassatthavikaṃ puna rājakulaṃ pavesenti, tadā pariyatti antarahitā nāma hoti.

[03]^b^Ciraṃ pavattissatī^eb^ti pariyattiyā antarahitāyapi liṅgamattaṃ addhānaṃ pavattissati. Kathaṃ? Gacchante gacchante hi kāle cīvaraggahaṇaṃ pattaggahaṇaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ ālokitavilokitaṃ na pāsādikaṃ hoti, nigaṇṭhasamaṇā viya alābupattaṃ bhikkhū pattaṃ aggabāhāya parikkhipitvā ādāya vicaranti, ettāvatāpi liṅgaṃ anantarahitameva hoti. Gacchante pana kāle aggabāhato otāretvā hatthena vā sikkāya vā olambetvā vicaranti, cīvarampi rajanasāruppaṃ akatvā oṭṭhaṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ katvā rajanti. Gacchante kāle rajanampi na hoti, dasacchindanaṃ ovaṭṭikāvijjhanaṃ kappamattañca katvā vaḷañjanti, puna ovaṭṭikaṃ vijjhitvā kappaṃ na karonti. Tato ubhayampi akatvā dasā chetvā paribbājakā viya caranti. Gacchante kāle ‘‘ko iminā amhākaṃ attho’’ti khuddakaṃ kāsāvakhaṇḍaṃ hatthe vā gīvāyaṃ vā bandhanti, kesesu vā allīyāpenti, dārabharaṇaṃ karontā kasitvā vapitvā jīvikaṃ kappetvā vicaranti, tadā dakkhiṇaṃ dento jano saṅghaṃ uddissa etesampi deti. Idaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā vuttaṃ ‘‘bhavissanti kho panānanda, anāgatamaddhānaṃ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā, tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dassanti, tadāpāhaṃ, ānanda, saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyyaṃ vadāmī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.380). Tato gacchante kāle nānāvidhāni kammāni karontā ‘‘papañco esa, kiṃ iminā amhāka’’nti kāsāvakhaṇḍaṃ chinditvā araññe khipanti, tasmiṃ kāle liṅgaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti. Kassapadasabalassa kira kālato paṭṭhāya yonakānaṃ setavatthāni pārupitvā caraṇacārittaṃ jātaṃ. Evaṃ pariyattiyā antarahitāyapi liṅgamattaṃ ciraṃ pavattissatīti veditabbaṃ.
[06]Aṭṭhagarudhammakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^404-405^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yadaggenā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0444^ea^^a^V3.0405^ea^ yaṃ divasaṃ ādiṃ katvā. ^b^Tadevā^eb^ti tasmiññeva divase. ^b^Anuññattiyā^eb^ti anuññāya. ^b^Ekāhaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhagavantaṃ varaṃ yācāmī^eb^ti ‘‘evameva kho ahaṃ, bhante ānanda, ime aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāmi yāvajīvaṃ anatikkamanīye’’ti paṭijānitvā idāni kasmā varaṃ yācatīti ce? Parūpavādavivajjanatthaṃ. Evañhi keci vadeyyuṃ ‘‘mahāpajāpatiyā paṭhamaṃ sampaṭicchitattā bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ nāhosi, sā ce varaṃ yāceyya, bhagavā anujāneyyā’’ti.

[03]^b^406^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sarāgāyā^eb^ti sarāgabhāvāya kāmarāgabhavarāgaparibrūhanāya. ^b^Saññogāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭe saṃyojanatthāya. ^b^Ācayāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭassa vaḍḍhanatthāya. ^b^Mahicchatāyā^eb^ti mahicchabhāvāya. ^b^Asantuṭṭhiyā^eb^ti asantuṭṭhibhāvāya. ^b^Saṅgaṇikāyā^eb^ti kilesasaṅgaṇagaṇasaṅgaṇavihārāya. ^b^Kosajjāyā^eb^ti kusītabhāvāya. ^b^Dubbharatāyā^eb^ti dupposatāya. ^b^Virāgāyā^eb^ti sakalavaṭṭato virajjanatthāya. ^b^Visaññogāyā^eb^ti kāmarāgādīhi visaṃyujjanatthāya. ^b^Apacayāyā^eb^ti sabbassapi vaṭṭassa apacayatthāya, nibbānāyāti attho. ^b^Appicchatāyā^eb^ti paccayappicchatādivasena sabbaso icchāpagamāya. ^b^Santuṭṭhiyā^eb^ti dvādasavidhasantuṭṭhibhāvāya. ^b^Pavivekāyā^eb^ti pavivittabhāvāya kāyavivekāditadaṅgavivekādivivekasiddhiyā. ^b^Vīriyārambhāyā^eb^ti kāyikassa ceva cetasikassa ca vīriyassa paggaṇhanatthāya. ^b^Subharatāyā^eb^ti sukhaposanatthāya. Evaṃ yo pariyattidhammo uggahaṇadhāraṇaparipucchāmanasikāravasena yoniso paṭipajjantassa sarāgādibhāvaparivajjanassa kāraṇaṃ hutvā virāgādibhāvāya saṃvattati, ekaṃsato ^b^eso dhammo, eso vinayo^eb^ sammadeva apāyādīsu apatanavasena dhāraṇato kilesānaṃ vinayanato, satthu sammāsambuddhassa ovādānusiṭṭhibhāvato ^b^etaṃ satthusāsana^eb^nti ^b^dhāreyyāsi^eb^ jāneyyāsi, avabujjheyyāsīti attho. Imasmiṃ sutte paṭhamavārena vaṭṭaṃ, dutiyavārena vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03]^b^409-410^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vimānetvā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0445^ea^ aparajjhitvā. ^b^Kammappattāyopī^eb^ti kammārahāpi. ^b^Āpattigāminiyopī^eb^ti āpattiāpannāyopi. ^b^Vuttanayeneva kāretabbataṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti tathākaraṇassa paṭikkhittattā dukkaṭena kāretabbataṃ āpajjanti.

[03]^b^413-5^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dve tisso bhikkhuniyo^eb^ti dvīhi tīhi bhikkhunīhi. ^b^Na ārocentī^eb^ti pātimokkhuddesakassa ^a^V3.0406^ea^ na ārocenti. ^b^Na paccāharantī^eb^ti bhikkhunīnaṃ na paccāharanti. ^b^Visesaka^eb^nti vattabhaṅgaṃ.
[03]^b^420^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tena ca bhikkhu nimantetabbo^eb^ti sāmīcidassanametaṃ, na pana animantiyā āpatti.
[03]^b^425^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tayo nissaye^eb^ti senāsananissayaṃ apanetvā apare tayo nissaye. Rukkhamūlasenāsanañhi sā na labhati.
[03]^b^428^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anuvādaṃ paṭṭhapentī^eb^ti issariyaṃ pavattenti.
[03]^b^430^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhikkhudūtena upasampādentī^eb^ti bhikkhuyeva dūto bhikkhudūto, tena bhikkhudūtena, bhikkhudūtaṃ katvā upasampādentīti attho.
[03]^b^431^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na sammatī^eb^ti nappahoti. ^b^Navakamma^eb^nti navakammaṃ katvā ‘‘ettakāni vassāni vasatū’’ti apaloketvā saṅghikabhūmidānaṃ.
[03]^b^432^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sannisinnagabbhā^eb^ti patiṭṭhitagabbhā.

[03]^b^434^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pabbajjampi na labhatī^eb^ti titthāyatanasaṅkantāya abhabbabhāvūpagamanato na labhati. ^b^Idaṃ odissa anuññātaṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ekato vā ubhato vā avassave satipi odissa anuññātattā vaṭṭati. Sesamettha pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca suviññeyyamevāti.
[06]Bhikkhunīupasampannānujānanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Bhikkhunikkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^437^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcasatikakkhandhake ^a^M3.0446^ea^^a^V3.0407^ea^^b^pāvāya kusināra^eb^nti (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.231) pāvānagare piṇḍāya caritvā kusināraṃ gamissāmīti addhānamaggappaṭipanno. ^b^Mandāravapupphaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti mahācāṭippamāṇaṃ pupphaṃ āgantukadaṇḍake ṭhapetvā chattaṃ viya gahetvā. ^b^Addasaṃ kho^eb^ti āgacchantaṃ dūratova addasaṃ. Disvā ca pana ‘‘pucchissāmi naṃ bhagavato pavatti’’nti cittaṃ uppādetvā ‘‘sace kho pana nisinnakova pucchissāmi, satthari agāravo kato bhavissatī’’ti uṭṭhahitvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato apakkamma chaddanto nāgarājā maṇicammaṃ viya dasabaladattiyaṃ meghavaṇṇapaṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā satthari katena gāravena ājīvakassa abhimukho hutvā ‘‘apāvuso amhākaṃ satthāraṃ jānāsī’’ti āha. Kiṃ pana satthu parinibbānaṃ jānanto pucchi ajānantoti? Āvajjanappaṭibaddhaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ jānanaṃ. Anāvajjitattā panesa ajānanto pucchīti eke. Thero samāpattibahulo rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaleṇamaṇḍapādīsu niccaṃ samāpattiphaleneva yāpeti. Kulasantakampi gāmaṃ pavisitvā dvāre samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhitova bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāti. Thero kira ‘‘iminā me pacchimena attabhāvena mahājanānuggahaṃ karissāmi, ye mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ vā denti, gandhamālādīhi vā sakkāraṃ karonti, tesaṃ taṃ mahapphalaṃ hotū’’ti evaṃ karoti. Tasmā samāpattibahulatāya na jāni. Iti ajānantova pucchīti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hettha ajānanakāraṇaṃ atthi. Abhilakkhitaṃ satthu parinibbānaṃ ahosi dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīhi nimittehi. Therassa pana parisāya kehici bhikkhūhi bhagavā diṭṭhapubbo, kehici na diṭṭhapubbo. Tattha yehi diṭṭhapubbo, tepi passitukāmāva. Yehipi adiṭṭhapubbo, tepi passitukāmāva. Tattha yehi na diṭṭhapubbo, te abhidassanakāmatāya gantvā ‘‘kuhiṃ bhagavā’’ti pucchantā ‘‘parinibbuto’’ti sutvā sandhāretuṃ na sakkhissanti. Cīvaraṃ chaḍḍetvā ekavatthā vā dunnivatthā vā urāni paṭipisantā parodissanti. Tattha manussā ‘‘mahākassapena saddhiṃ ^a^V3.0408^ea^ āgatapaṃsukūlikā sayampi itthiyo viya parodanti, te ^a^M3.0447^ea^ kiṃ amhe samassāsentī’’ti mayhaṃ dosaṃ dassanti. Idaṃ pana suññaṃ mahāraññaṃ, idha yathā tathā rodantesu doso natthi. Purimataraṃ sutvā nāma sokopi tanuko hotīti bhikkhūnaṃ satuppādalābhatthaṃ jānantova pucchi.

[03]^b^Ajja sattāhaparinibbuto^eb^ti ajja divasato paṭilomato sattame ahani parinibbuto. ^b^Tato me ida^eb^nti tato samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbutaṭṭhānato. ^b^Avītarāgā^eb^ti puthujjanā ceva sotāpannasakadāgāmino ca. Tesañhi domanassaṃ appahīnaṃ, tasmā tepi bāhā paggayha kandanti, ubho hatthe sīse ṭhapetvā rodanti. ^b^Chinnapātaṃ papatantī^eb^ti chinnānaṃ pāto viya chinnapāto, taṃ chinnapātaṃ, bhāvanapuṃsakaniddesoyaṃ, majjhe chinnā viya hutvā yato vā tato vā patantīti attho. ^b^Āvaṭṭantī^eb^ti abhimukhabhāvena vaṭṭanti. Yattha patitā, tato katipayaratanaṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭanavaseneva gantvā puna yathāpatitameva ṭhānaṃ vaṭṭanavasena āgacchanti. ^b^Vivaṭṭantī^eb^ti yattha patitā, tato nivaṭṭanti, patitaṭṭhānato parabhāgaṃ vaṭṭamānā gacchantīti attho. Apica purato vaṭṭanaṃ ^b^āvaṭṭanaṃ,^eb^ passato pacchato ca vaṭṭanaṃ ^b^vivaṭṭanaṃ^eb^. Tasmā dve pāde pasāretvā sakiṃ purato sakiṃ pacchato sakiṃ vāmato sakiṃ dakkhiṇato samparivaṭṭamānāpi āvaṭṭanti vivaṭṭantīti vuccanti. ^b^Vītarāgā^eb^ti pahīnadomanassā iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu nibbikāratāya silāthambhasadisā anāgāmikhīṇāsavā. Kāmañhi domanasse asatipi ekacco rāgo hotiyeva, rāge pana asati domanassassa asambhavoyeva. Tadekaṭṭhabhāvato hi rāgappahānena pahīnadomanassā vuttā, na khīṇāsavā eva.

[03]^b^Sabbeheva piyehī^eb^tiādīsu piyāyitabbato ^b^piyehi^eb^ manavaḍḍhanato ^b^manāpehi^eb^ mātāpitābhātābhaginīādikehi. ^b^Nānābhāvo^eb^ti jātiyā nānābhāvo, jātianurūpagamanena visuṃ bhāvo, asambaddhabhāvoti attho. ^b^Vinābhāvo^eb^ti maraṇena vinābhāvo, cutiyā tenattabhāvena apunapavattanato vippayogoti attho. ^b^Aññathābhāvo^eb^ti bhavena aññathābhāvo, bhavantaraggahaṇena ‘‘kāmāvacarasatto ^a^M3.0448^ea^ rūpāvacaro hotī’’tiādinā tatthāpi ‘‘manusso devo hotī’’tiādinā ca purimākārato aññākāratāti attho. ^b^Ta^eb^nti tasmā. ^b^Kutettha labbhā^eb^ti kuto kuhiṃ kasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne ettha etasmiṃ khandhappavatte yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ…pe… mā palujjīti laddhuṃ sakkā, na sakkā eva tādisassa kāraṇassa abhāvato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā sabbeheva piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo, tasmā dasa pāramiyo pūretvāpi sambodhiṃ patvāpi dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvāpi yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvāpi devorohaṇaṃ katvāpi yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ ^a^V3.0409^ea^ palokadhammaṃ, tañca tathāgatassapi sarīraṃ mā palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, rodantenapi kandantenapi na sakkā taṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhunti.
[03]^b^Tena kho panāvuso, samayena subhaddo nāma vuḍḍhapabbajito^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^nidānavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (sārattha. ṭī. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā) vuttanayameva.
[06]Saṅgītinidānakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^441^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samūhaneyyā^eb^ti ākaṅkhamāno samūhanatu, yadi icchati, samūhaneyyāti attho. Kasmā pana ‘‘samūhanathā’’ti ekaṃseneva avatvā ‘‘ākaṅkhamāno samūhaneyyā’’ti vikappavacaneneva bhagavā ṭhapesīti? Mahākassapassa ñāṇabalassa diṭṭhattā. Passati hi bhagavā ‘‘samūhanathāti vuttepi saṅgītikāle kassapo na samūhanissatī’’ti, tasmā vikappeneva ṭhapesi. Yadi asamūhananaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, tadeva ca icchitaṃ, atha kasmā bhagavā ‘‘ākaṅkhamāno samūhanatū’’ti avocāti? Tathārūpapuggalajjhāsayavasena. Santi hi keci khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samādāya vattituṃ anicchantā, tesaṃ tathā avuccamāne bhagavati vighāto uppajjeyya, taṃ tesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya. Tathā pana vutte tesaṃ vighāto na uppajjeyya, amhākamevāyaṃ doso, yato amhesuyeva keci samūhananaṃ na icchantīti ^a^M3.0449^ea^. Keci ‘‘sakalassa pana sāsanassa saṅghāyattabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ tathā vutta’’nti vadanti. Yaṃ kiñci satthārā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sirasā sampaṭicchitvā jīvitaṃ viya rakkhanti. Tathā hi te ‘‘khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni ākaṅkhamāno saṅgho samūhanatū’’ti vuttepi na samūhaniṃsu. Aññadatthu purato viya tassa accayepi rakkhiṃsuyevāti satthu sāsanassa saṅghassa ca mahantabhāvadassanatthampi tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi āyasmā ānando aññepi vā bhikkhū ‘‘katamaṃ pana, bhante, khuddakaṃ, katamaṃ anukhuddaka’’nti na pucchiṃsu samūhanajjhāsayasseva abhāvato, teneva ekasikkhāpadampi apariccajitvā sabbesaṃ anuggahetabbabhāvadassanatthaṃ ‘‘cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā avasesāni khuddānukhuddakānī’’tiādimāhaṃsu. Evañhi vadantehi ‘‘khuddānukhuddakā ime nāmā’’ti avinicchitattā sabbesaṃ anuggahetabbabhāvo dassito hoti.

[03]^b^442^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atha^eb^^a^V3.0410^ea^^b^kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesī^eb^ti ettha pana keci vadanti ‘‘bhante nāgasena, katamaṃ khuddakaṃ, katamaṃ anukhuddakanti milindaraññā pucchite ‘dukkaṭaṃ mahārāja, khuddakaṃ, dubbhāsitaṃ anukhuddaka’nti (mi. pa. 4.2.1) vuttattā nāgasenatthero khuddānukhuddakaṃ jāni, mahākassapatthero pana taṃ ajānanto ‘suṇātu me āvuso’tiādinā kammavācaṃ sāvesī’’ti, na taṃ evaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Nāgasenatthero hi paresaṃ vādapathopacchedanatthaṃ saṅgītikāle dhammasaṅgāhakamahātherehi gahitakoṭṭhāsesu antimakoṭṭhāsameva gahetvā milindarājānaṃ saññāpesi, mahākassapatthero pana ekasikkhāpadampi asamūhanitukāmatāya tathā kammavācaṃ sāvesi.

[03]Tattha ^b^gihigatānī^eb^ti gihipaṭisaṃyuttānīti vadanti. Gihīsu gatāni, tehi ñātāni ^b^gihigatānī^eb^ti evaṃ panettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Dhūmakālo etassāti ^b^dhūmakālikaṃ^eb^ citakadhūmavūpasamato paraṃ appavattanato. ^b^Appaññatta^eb^ntiādīsu (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.136; a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.7.23) navaṃ adhammikaṃ katikavattaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ vā bandhantā ^b^appaññattaṃ paññapenti^eb^ nāma purāṇasanthatavatthusmiṃ sāvatthiyaṃ bhikkhū viya. Uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ sāsanaṃ dīpentā ^b^paññattaṃ samucchindanti^eb^ nāma vassasataparinibbute bhagavati ^a^M3.0450^ea^ vesālikā vajjiputtakā viya. Khuddānukhuddakā pana āpattiyo sañcicca vītikkamantā ^b^yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya na vattanti^eb^ nāma assajipunabbasukā viya. Navaṃ pana katikavattaṃ vā sikkhāpadaṃ vā abandhantā, dhammato vinayato sāsanaṃ dīpentā, khuddānukhuddakampi ca sikkhāpadaṃ asamūhanantā ^b^appaññattaṃ na paññapenti, paññattaṃ na samucchindanti, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattanti^eb^ nāma āyasmā upaseno viya āyasmā yaso kākaṇḍakaputto viya ca.
[03]^b^443^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhagavatā oḷārike nimitte kayiramāne^eb^ti vesāliṃ nissāya cāpāle cetiye viharantena bhagavatā –

[08]‘‘Ramaṇīyā, ānanda, vesālī, ramaṇīyaṃ udenacetiyaṃ, ramaṇīyaṃ gotamakacetiyaṃ, ramaṇīyaṃ sattambacetiyaṃ, ramaṇīyaṃ bahuputtacetiyaṃ, ramaṇīyaṃ sārandadacetiyaṃ, ramaṇīyaṃ cāpālacetiyaṃ. Yassa kassaci, ānanda, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā, so ākaṅkhamāno kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā. Tathāgatassa kho pana, ānanda, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ^a^V3.0411^ea^ yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā, so ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, tathāgato kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ vā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.166) –
[07]Evaṃ oḷārike nimitte kayiramāne.

[03]^b^Mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto^eb^ti mārena ajjhotthaṭacitto. Māro hi yassa sabbena sabbaṃ dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā, tassa cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti. Therassa ca cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā, tenassa māro cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāsi. So pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ karonto kiṃ karotīti? Bheravaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā dasseti, saddārammaṇaṃ vā sāveti, tato sattā taṃ disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā vivaṭamukhā honti, tesaṃ mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayaṃ maddati, tato visaññāva hutvā tiṭṭhanti ^a^M3.0451^ea^. Therassa panesa mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati, bheravārammaṇaṃ pana dassesi, taṃ disvā thero nimittobhāsaṃ na paṭivijjhi.
[06]Khuddānukhuddakasikkhāpadakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^445^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ujjavanikāyā^eb^ti paṭisotagāminiyā. ^b^Rajoharaṇa^eb^nti rajopuñchanī. ^b^Na kulavaṃ gamentī^eb^ti niratthakavināsanaṃ na gamenti. Kucchito lavo ^b^kulavo,^eb^ anayavināsoti vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Dhammavinayasaṅgītiyā’’ti vattabbe saṅgītiyā vinayappadhānattā ^b^‘‘vinayasaṅgītiyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Vinayappadhānā saṅgīti ^b^vinayasaṅgīti^eb^. Sesamettha suviññeyyamevāti.
[06]Pañcasatikakkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^446^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattasatikakkhandhake ^a^M3.0452^ea^^a^V3.0412^ea^^b^nikkhittamaṇisuvaṇṇā^eb^ti rūpiyasikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhittamaṇisuvaṇṇā. Tattha maṇiggahaṇena sabbaṃ dukkaṭavatthu, suvaṇṇaggahaṇena sabbaṃ pācittiyavatthu gahitaṃ hoti. ^b^Bhikkhaggenā^eb^ti bhikkhugaṇanāya.

[03]^b^447^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upakkilesā^eb^ti virocituṃ adatvā upakkiliṭṭhabhāvakaraṇena upakkilesā. ^b^Mahikā^eb^ti himaṃ. Dhūmo ca rajo ca ^b^dhūmarajo^eb^. Ettha purimā tayo asampattaupakkilesā, rāhu pana sampattaupakkilesavasena kathitoti veditabbo. ^b^Samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti na bhāsanti na virocantī^eb^ti guṇapatāpena na tapanti guṇobhāsena na bhāsanti guṇavirocanena na virocanti. ^b^Surāmerayapānā appaṭiviratā^eb^ti pañcavidhāya surāya catubbidhassa ca merayassa pānato aviratā.

[03]^b^Avijjānivuṭā^eb^ti avijjāya nivāritā pihitā. ^b^Piyarūpābhinandino^eb^ti piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ abhinandamānā tussamānā. ^b^Sādiyantī^eb^ti gaṇhanti. ^b^Aviddasū^eb^ti andhabālā. ^b^Sarajā^eb^ti sakilesarajā. ^b^Magā^eb^ti migasadisā. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye bhave vā netīti netti, taṇhāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tāya saha vattantīti ^b^sanettikā^eb^.

[03]^b^448^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Taṃ parisaṃ etadavocā^eb^ti (saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.4.362) tassa kira evaṃ ahosi ‘‘kulaputtā pabbajantā puttadārañceva jātarūparajatañca pahāyeva pabbajanti, na ca sakkā yaṃ pahāya pabbajitā taṃ etehi gāhetu’’nti nayaggāhe ṭhatvā etaṃ ^b^‘‘mā ayyā’’^eb^tiādivacanaṃ avoca. ^b^Ekaṃseneta^eb^nti etaṃ pañcakāmaguṇakappanaṃ ‘‘assamaṇadhammo asakyaputtiyadhammo’’ti ekaṃsena dhāreyyāsi.

[03]^b^Tiṇa^eb^nti ^a^V3.0413^ea^ senāsanacchadanatiṇaṃ. ^b^Pariyesitabba^eb^nti tiṇacchadane vā iṭṭhakacchadane vā gehe palujjante yehi taṃ kāritaṃ, tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ^a^M3.0453^ea^ ‘‘tumhehi kāritaṃ senāsanaṃ ovassati, na sakkā tattha vasitu’’nti ācikkhitabbaṃ. Manussā sakkontā karissanti, asakkontā ‘‘tumhe vaḍḍhakī gahetvā kārāpetha, mayaṃ te saññāpessāmā’’ti vakkhanti. Evaṃ vutte kāretvā tesaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ, manussā vaḍḍhakīnaṃ dātabbaṃ dassanti. Sace āvāsasāmikā natthi, aññesampi bhikkhācāravattena ārocetvā kāretuṃ vaṭṭati. Imaṃ sandhāya ‘‘pariyesitabba’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Dārū^eb^ti senāsane gopānasiādīsu palujjamānesu tadatthāya dāru pariyesitabbaṃ. ^b^Sakaṭa^eb^nti gihivikaṭaṃ vā tāvakālikaṃ vā katvā sakaṭaṃ pariyesitabbaṃ. Na kevalañca sakaṭameva, aññampi vāsipharasukudālādiupakaraṇaṃ evaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Puriso^eb^ti hatthakammavasena puriso pariyesitabbo. Yaṃ kañci hi purisaṃ ‘‘hatthakammaṃ āvuso dassasī’’ti vatvā ‘‘dassāmi bhante’’ti vutte ‘‘imasmiṃ idañcidañca karohī’’ti yaṃ icchati, taṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Na tvevāhaṃ gāmaṇi kenaci pariyāyenā^eb^ti jātarūparajataṃ panāhaṃ kenacipi kāraṇena pariyesitabbanti na vadāmi.
[03]^b^449^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāpakaṃ kata^eb^nti asundaraṃ kataṃ.
[03]^b^450^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ahogaṅgo^eb^ti tassa pabbatassa nāmaṃ.
[03]^b^451^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭikacceva gaccheyya^eb^nti yattha taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ bhikkhū sannipatanti, tattha paṭhamameva gaccheyyaṃ. ^b^Sambhāvesu^eb^nti pāpuṇiṃsu.
[03]^b^452^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aloṇakaṃ bhavissatī^eb^ti aloṇakaṃ bhattaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā bhavissati. ^b^Āsutā^eb^ti sabbasambhārasajjitā. ‘‘Asuttā’’ti vā pāṭho.
[03]^b^453^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ujjaviṃsū^eb^ti nāvaṃ āruyha paṭisotena gacchiṃsu. ^b^Pācīnakā^eb^ti pācīnadesavāsino.

[03]^b^454^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nanu tvaṃ āvuso vuḍḍho vīsativassosī^eb^ti nanu tvaṃ āvuso vīsativasso, na nissayapaṭibaddho ^a^V3.0414^ea^, kasmā taṃ thero paṇāmetīti dīpenti. ^b^Garunissayaṃ gaṇhāmā^eb^ti kiñcāpi mayaṃ mahallakā, etaṃ pana theraṃ garuṃ katvā vasissāmāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^455^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mettāya ^a^M3.0454^ea^ rūpāvacarasamādhimattabhāvato ^b^‘‘kullakavihārenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, khuddakena vihārenāti attho, khuddakatā cassa agambhīrabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘uttānavihārenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Suññatāvihārenā^eb^ti suññatāmukhena adhigataphalasamāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^457^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suttavibhaṅge^eb^ti padabhājanīye. ^b^Tena saddhi^eb^nti purepaṭiggahitaloṇena saddhiṃ. ^b^Na hi ettha yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita^eb^nti ‘‘kappati siṅgiloṇakappo’’ti ettha vuttasiṅgiloṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi pure paṭiggahetvā siṅgena parihaṭaṃ na tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ. ^b^Yāvakālikameva tadahupaṭiggahita^eb^nti siṅgiloṇena missetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ aloṇāmisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Uposathasaṃyutte^eb^ti uposathapaṭisaṃyutte, uposathakkhandhaketi vuttaṃ hoti. Atisaraṇaṃ atisāro, atikkamo. Vinayassa atisāro ^b^vinayātisāro. Taṃ pamāṇaṃ karontassā^eb^ti dasāya saddhiṃ nisīdane yaṃ pamāṇaṃ vuttaṃ, dasāya vinā taṃ pamāṇaṃ karontassa. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Sattasatikakkhandhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^Dvivaggasaṅgahā^eb^ti cūḷavaggamahāvaggasaṅkhātehi dvīhi vaggehi saṅgahitā. ^b^Dvāvīsatipabhedanā^eb^ti mahāvagge dasa, cūḷavagge dvādasāti evaṃ dvāvīsatippabhedā. ^b^Sāsane^eb^ti satthusāsane. Ye khandhakā vuttāti yojetabbaṃ.
[06]Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
[06]Cūḷavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
